Given the body, I think it’s a female. You said. The person pulls off her cover on her head to reveal she’s a twilik. A twilik? Out here? Must be out for a master or possibly a bounty hunter. You said. As she walks around, you stay hidden. You wanted to keep an eye on her, so you watch her until she looks into your direction and you duck down. I hope she didn’t see me. You said.
1111121121211.title: Scavenges at work

choices: Rey can't bring herself to leave you
11111211212111.content:
Who’s there? She said in human. Damn. She saw me. You said. She walks towards where you’re hiding. I know you’re there. Show yourself. She said. Can’t let her see me. You said. Taking a chance, you go into the deep parts of the x wing. She looks at where you were hiding, but sees no one. Where are you? She said. Ok. I just need to stay hidden until Rey comes back. You said. You work your way out of the x wing and land on the soft sand. I know I saw a small human around here. She said. Great. You said lowly. You hide behind a severed wing. After searching and coming up empty, the twilik calls out to you. I know your still here, human. I’ll find you. She said. Sounds like won’t let me go if she does. You said. You see that you could get away into the open desert, but you’d have to run quickly. If I could make that run, I’m home free. But what if Rey comes back? Who knows what this twilik will do? You said. While thinking about running, you see a giant eye looing right at you. Found you! She said. Shit! You said. You back up and run from her before she could grab you. Hey! Get back here! She said. You make your way to a tie fighter wing, but she grabs you before you could get behind it. Gotcha! She said. Her grip on you was tight. You could barely breath or speak.

I didn’t think I find a tiny human all the way out here. She said. Look…..i’m sure…..we can talk this out. You said. About what? You’re tiny, I caught you, and by scavenging law, you’re mine. She said. T…That scavenging law isn’t a thing! You made that up! You said. Are you getting an attitude with someone who can easily turn you to mush? She said. Her grip tightens on you. You feel like your body is going to explode. Feel that? All that pressure? A little more and you’ll pop. She said. She eases her grip on you. Now should I keep you or sell you off? A tiny human must be worth a fortune. She said. Y…..You can’t just sell me! I’m a person! Not an object! You said. Her grip tightens again. You’re whatever I decided. Person, object, whatever. You got that? She said. L….Loud…..and c….clear. You said. Now who would-ugh! She said as she’s hit over the head with a blunt object. You suddenly find yourself freefalling to the ground, but are caught in a pair of soft hands. Rey! You said happily. Sorry for taking so long. I rushed over as soon as I was done unloading everything we got. She said. I say we call it a day. You said. Did she hurt you? Rey said concerned. She squeezed me pretty good, but nothing broken. You said. All I need to hear. She said. Rey pulls out her blaster and hold it against the twilik’s head. Come near him again and I’ll splatter your brains all over the desert! She said. Rey, holding you close to her, gets in her speeder and drives away.

Rey arrives back at her home and looks over you. Are you still hurting? She said. My….bones will heal. The thought of being sold is what’s getting me. You said. Sold?! Rey said. Yeah. Whereas you were joking, she was thinking of either keeping or selling me. You said. Rey gently rubs you on your back to comfort you. It’s ok. She’ll have to go through me first. And I won’t let her take you from me. Rey said. Thanks….. That brings me some sense of safety. You said. Can you move at least? She said. I can, but if you’re expecting me to climb you any time soon, it’s going to take a while before I can. You said. I guess no more scavenging until you’re ok again. She said. I’ll just stay here. Don’t let me stop you from your payday. I can nurse myself. You said. No. You’re under my care and supervision. Like I said before, you’re more important to me than anything. Scrap, credits, all of it combined. If it means keeping you safe, I’ll give it all up. She said. I don’t think you need to go that far just for me……but thanks anyway. So are you going to the outpost or going back out there? You said. I want to stay and make sure you’re ok. She said. Rey. I don’t want to stop you from doing what you’re good at. You’ve been doing all this before you meet me. I don’t want you to just drop everything because of my stature. It’s good you care, but don’t make me the center of everything. You said. I…..just want to make sure nothing happens to my little love. She said. With you, nothing will. As much as you care for me, i don't think even a Sith lord will try anything. But don’t let it me be the center of your world. So what are you going to do? You said. *Sigh* Ok. Ok. You talked me into it. I’ll do what i usually do. She said defeated. That’s my giant lover. You said.

choices: The twelik has her way with you
111112112121111.content:
Ok. If I go, you have to promise me not to leave. At all. For anything. She said. I won’t Rey. Where would I go anyway? You said. Somewhere. She said. Rey gives you a long, yet passionate kiss. Rey- Just let me have this. She interrupts. Rey breaks the kiss after two minutes and places you on her table. Ok. I’ll be back in a few hours. It’ll be the longest hours of my life. She said. You’re exaggerating. I’ll be fine by myself. You said. Rey hops into her speeder and drives away. Ok. Let’s see if I can find something to occupy my time. You said. You jump into the soft sand. I might want to explore a little. See what Rey’s home is like. You said. You explore Rey’s home. Hm. A stove and a small refrigerator. This is her kitchen. I wonder what she eats for a living? Since she didn’t take a liking to me, I guess tiny people aren’t it. You joke. You explore more and come across a shower. A shower? For this to work, she must have to hook this up to a water source. Think I see why she wants to keep me close. She’s been out here for a long time. Too long. You said. You continue your exploration. Not only does she have a refrigerator and shower, but a makeshift laundry room, a place for her gear, and she's redesigned the AT-AT's power core as a heater for cold nights.

She's made a nice home out of this wrecked AT-AT. I don’t think she’d mind living here if she had a companion. I guess that’s where I come in. All these years out here all alone. No friends, no parents, not even a pet. Just herself. At least I had my mother. We had it rough, but we had each other. Rey had nobody. I wouldn't be surprised if she has kept count of how long she's been her by herself.You said. As the minutes ticked by, you wait for Rey to come back. You wait and wait until you hear the sounds of a speeder coming to a halt. So soon? I thought that would…… Oh no! You said. You look to see it’s that Twelik from before. This lady can’t take a hint. You said. She comes inside the AT-AT. So this is where she lives? Pitiful. Just like those so called traps she has. She said. Just wait you green skinned bitch…. When Rey gets back, she’ll show you who’s really pitiful. You said with anger in your voice and eyes. If it wasn’t for your small size, you’d take on this twelik for bad mouthing Rey. Now. Where would I keep a small human if I was a lonely, desperate human girl? She said. This twelik is asking for it. You said. She stops right in front of you. Where are you, tiny? I know she left you here. She mutters. Looking down would help. I’m not that small. You said. As if she heard you, she looks right down at you. There you are. Come here. She said. She grabs you roughly and hoist you up.

You just don’t know when to quit. You said. Not after what she pulled. Attacking me unprovoked. She said. You deserved it. I’d hit you more than once. You said. You talk a big game for such a small guy. She said. Trust me. If I wasn’t this small, you’d be dead in a sandstorm right now. You said. Maybe. But you are this small. Now how should I go about this? Should I just kill you? Or wait for her and kill you in front of her? Or maybe I should kill her in front of you? She said. You wouldn’t dare!! You said. Yeah. The last thing she sees is me taking the one thing she cares about away from her. She said. You leave her out of this! You shout. Ohhh. Someone’s fired up. You care for this human? She said. What’s it to you? You said. You know what? I won’t kill her or you. She said. You’re going to leave us alone? You said. No. I have an even better idea. I’ll make you fall out of love with her. She said. You’ll have an easier time killing a sith lord than that. You said. We’ll see. I have enough time to change your mind. She said. She drops you into her cleavage and presses them together. I know you like this. Being pressed against by two orbs. Must excite you, doesn’t it? She said. You must think I’m that desperate. You might have a bigger chest, but that means nothing to me. You’ll never have what Rey has! I will not leave her for you! You said. You say that now, but let’s see who’s name you’re saying at the end of the day. She said.
111112112121111.title: She just won't stay away

1111121121211111.content:
So let’s see if you really are in love with this human. She said. You can be fully naked and I’d still pick her over you. You said. Fully naked? Great idea. She said. She places you on the table and slowly, but seductively takes off each piece of clothing until she’s bare naked in front of you. Enjoy the show? She said. Would not recommend seeing. You said. No need to be mean. I’m about to make all your dreams come true. She said. You wouldn’t like what I’m dreaming right now. You said. She picks you up. Now, let’s see if you really are loyal to this human. She said. I am. Now and forever. You said. Hmm. Let’s go ahead and get straight to it. She said. She lowers you to her womanhood. You could feel the intense heat coming form it as you got closer and are shoved inside. She pushes you further inside her. You desperately crawl your way out, all the while sending her into pure bliss. Ahhhhh. More! Not just yet! She said. She pushes you back in, but deeper this time. I’m not going to be your plaything! You said. You crawl all the way back and squirm your way out of her just just as she climaxes. Damnit! Covered in her fluids. Who knows where she's been. You said. So. Did you….enjoy yourself in there? She said. Not in the slightest. I'd enjoy a shower right now. And before you ask, still in love with Rey. You said. For now. Just means I need to try something else. She said. She brings to her lips and starts kissing you. You try to push her lips away, but she continues to barrage you with kisses. Mwah. Kisses sweeter than candy. She said. Those were not sweet. Poison is more like it. You said. Well then, let’s see take it to another level. She said. She drops you on her left breast. Go on. Have as much fun as you want. She said. No. You said. Come on. How can you say that? They are twice as bigger than hers.How do you not want to play with them? She said. It might be a shocker to you, but size doesn’t matter. You said. Let’s see if you really believe that. She said. She moves you between them and press them together. Feel how soft they are? This is everyman’s dream right here. She said. For two minutes, she playfully mashes them together. You can’t say you don’t like this. Some men would kill to be in the position you’re in. She said. Then go-wait. If I keep denying her, she’ll keep at this. She’ll exhaust me to death. Literally. If I just say what she wants to hear, she’ll drop this nonsense and Rey can kick her green ass to where she came from. You said. Maybe a second journey inside. She said.


No! No. You win. You said. Really? Then say it. She said. I….. love you. You said. Are you just saying that to stop all this? She said. What’s the point? You said. One: you actually mean it. Two: You’re just saying it to make me stop. She said. So what do you want me to do then? You said. If you’re being serious, then I want you to break her heart. Right in front of me. She said. You….want to watch? You said. Yeah. If you say you love me now, then you’d have no problem doing it. She said. You didn’t think she’d pull this. To tell Rey straight to her face. You don’t know if Rey will understand what you’re doing. Well? Are you? She said. …….Fine. I’ll tell her. You said. Straight to her face? She said. Straight to her face. You said. After putting her clothes back on, you both wait until Rey comes back. I just hope Rey will give me the time to explain. You mumble. After waiting two hours, you hear a speeder. Showtime. The twilik said. She goes to hide. You wait until Rey comes inside. Tyne? You in here? I got us some food we could share. She said. Rey! Over here! You shout. Rey looks to see you on the counter. (That smile of hers….. Couldn’t be anymore perfect.) You thought. As Rey comes closer, the twilik jams a blaster to her head. Drop. Now. Slowly. She said. Surprised, Rey slowly drops to her knees. The weapons. Get rid of them. One wrong move and I’ll blast that that tiny human. She said. You leave him out of this! Rey said. Get rid of the weapons. I won't ask again. She said. Rey tosses away her weapons and her staff. Look……just take what you want…..and leave. Rey said. Nothing of value in this dump. Except one thing. Tell her. She said. Rey….. I……I can’t. Not like this. You said. Tell her or she get one in the back of her head. She said. …..Fine. You said. You look Rey in the eyes. You find it difficult to talk when you stared her in the eyes. Rey….. I….. I don’t……love you anymore. You said. What?!? TYNE!?! Rey said with tears forming in her eyes. Keep going. The twilik said. I….. I’ve fallen for…..Valeria. You said. After everything we’ve been through?!? After what I’ve told you about me!?! She said. You steel your heart for what you’re about to say. I….i know. And…..i don’t care. You coldly. Hearing you say that so coldly, Rey breaks down in tears. There. You happy?! Done exactly as you said! Now let her go! You said. Not yet. She’s still has her life. And as she is now, I think she’d rather be dead. So I’m doing her a favor. She said. NO!!!!!! You shout. You hold out your hand and she is pushed against the cold metal wall with a few other things and knocked out. What the? How did I….nevermind. Rey! You said. You jump down on the metal floor, not even caring about your twisted ankle. You just make your way to comfort a sobbing Rey.

11111211212111111.content:
Rey. Rey! Look at me. I want to explain myself. It’s not what you think. You said. When Rey holds her head up, you can see her eyes are red from crying hard. Rey. Listen I never-ack!!! You said as she grabs you tightly and stands up. Rey……are you…..trying to kill…..me?! You said. Shut up!!! After everything, EVERYTHING, I did for you. I told you about how I had nobody. You were the one and only person in this world I thought who wouldn’t leave me! She said. I wasn’t……. I would never……. You said through breaths. Then why?!? Why did you say all that to me?!? And so mean?!? For her!?Did you even care about me to begin with?! She said. You can feel her grip on you getting tighter to the point where you can’t breath. (If she…..doesn’t crush me……. she’ll suffocate me.) You thought. Rey…..let me……explain….. You said. Explain what?! That you never gave a care about me?! Just stay with me because I’m so lonely, depressed girl?! Someone to toss away when you find someone better?!? She said. Rey……if…..you don’t loosen……your hold…..you’re…..killing me. You said. And? Maybe that’s what I want to do. It’d be one less horrible person in the world. Maybe killing you will make me happy again. She said. You…..don’t mean……that…… Please……you’ll regret it…….if you kill…..me. You said with your last breath of air. You try to breath in, but can’t with Rey’s tight grip. Your lung start to shrivel and your chest starts to burn. Just when you thought you’d pass out, Rey opens her hand. You gasp in air. Thank *gasps* you……. You said. After a few seconds of heaving, Rey close her hand around you and places her thumb under your chin to make you look her in the eyes. The only reason I didn’t crush you in my hand or suffocate you was to hear what you have to say. And it better be the truth, Tyne. I’m not in the mood for lies right now. She said. I promised you that. You’ll get nothing but the truth. You said.

I would never say those things to, Rey. I only said them because she threaten to kill you if I didn’t. She tried to make me fall out of love with you. She tried to every trick in the book, but I was, and still am, in love with you. I just said those things so she’d quit. You said. What did she do? Rey said. She pushed me inside her, squeezed me between her breast, kissed me, and all that. But I didn’t like it. I have eyes for one lady. And that’s you. You said. Then tell me. Person to person. Would you leave me? She said. Really? You’re asking me that? If I wanted to leave you, I would have left by now. I’d taken my chances in the hot, unkind desert. If I wanted nothing to do with you, I’d run from you the second I first saw you. Do you want to know why I’m still with you? The real reason why I stay with you? You said. I do. Rey said bracing for the worse. I stay with you not because you’re a giant keeping me against my will or some lonely girl in need of companionship. I stay with you because I love you. From sunrise to the cold nights, I love you. Everything about you, I love. The small giggles in your sleep, the animal like yawn in the morning, even your tough attitude. Everything that makes you you, I love. I don’t love that harlot over there, I love the scavenging, tough as they come, yet sweet girl right in front of me. You said. So you wouldn’t leave me for that over there? Even if we have a very bad day with each other? Even if we start to become a nuisance to each other? You’d still stay in love with me? Rey said. Yes. I said what I said so she’d buy it. It had to sound genuine. It had to feel like I did fall out of love with you. Look, if I lost your trust over this, just tell me. I’ll do whatever you want me to do to prove that. I don’t care how demanding or demeaning it is. If I can regain your trust in me, I’ll do it. You said. You’ll go to the ends of Jakku for me? She said. Yes. You said. Rob a powerful hutt? She said. Yes. I said anything. I want you to know that my feeling haven’t change just because of her. So if you want me to prove it, just say so and I’ll do it. You said. Ok. Give me a few minutes. She said. Rey puts you down and ties up Valera. Rey then walks back in and and picks you up.


So you’ll do anything? She said. Whatever you want. Just name it. You said. Ok. I want you to....

111112112121111111.content:
Walk into my mouth. Prove you trust me with your life right now. She said. Even though she’s not showing it, you can tell she’s still angry. But you know she wouldn’t hurt you intentionally and you’ve already been inside her mouth once already, so it won’t be as scary as last time. So you walk right into her mouth and Rey starts to toss you around. After a few seconds, you land in the center of her tongue a little exhausted and start to slide to her throat, but Rey forces you back to the center of her tongue and pushes you up against the roof of her mouth. Rey moves her tongue off you and you fall onto the soft muscle. She moves you over to her teeth and plants them firmly on you. You wait for her to just grind you down a thick paste, but it never comes. All she does is sigh heavily, opens her mouth and you roll out into her hands. As you slowly stand up, Rey rubs your back with her finger. You ok? She said. Yeah….. You said. I didn’t….hurt or anything? Or scare you? She said. My equilibrium is all over, but it will come back. Feel better now? You said. A little. Did you think I would gulp you down even with you so close in there? She said. I told you I trusted you. I knew you were mad, but not that mad enough to treat me like food. I felt more like a punching bag in there. Seems more like what you wanted me to be at the start. You said. Did you mind that? She said. No. You need to work off some steam. Not healthy to let it stay bottled up. You said.

Listen. I’m sorry for the way I acted earlier. I wasn’t thinking. I was listening to my emotions and everything got out of hand. Deep down, I knew you were just saying that for her, but it hit me a lot harder than I thought. She said. Soo……I’m forgiven? You said. I should be asking that. I was so close to killing you. The one person who gives me love and attention. The one person who gives a damn about me. Best girlfriend in the world. She said before crying. Rey, It’s ok. I know you were just acting out of anger. I don’t blame you for doing what you did. If I could have come up with something better, I would have. Do you want to know what I really wanted to say in front of her? You said. *Sniff* What? She said as she brings her head up. That Rey is the most beautiful girl in the galaxy. That I wouldn’t leave her for a harem of twiliks like you. That she has you beat in everything. A fool would only leave her and I’m no fool. I’m not leaving her alone here. You said. Hearing your kind and heartfelt words, Rey hugs you tightly. Thank you, Tyne. Just…..Thank you. Can you forgive me for hurting you? She said. I’ve been forgiven you. Even if you did kill me, I’d still forgive you. You said. Thank you. I really…..really don’t deserve a good guy like you. She said. Well, you got me. And I’m staying with you until the end of time. You said. *Laughs* That’s a long time. You’ll still be interested in me? I’ll be old and grey. She said. Then we’ll be old and grey together. Just you, me, and the endless horde of Tusken raiders. You said. *Laughs* I needed to laugh after all this. Rey said. I prefer to see a smiling Rey than a crying Rey.

So what are we going to do with…..her over there? You said. She doesn’t have the lives for the things I want to do with her. I think we should kill her. Her kind are a dime a dozen, so no one will miss her anyway. She said. You’d normally agree with Rey, but something lingered in the back of your mind. You held out your arm and she hit the like a strong gust of hit her. (I heard stories about force. Old stories about how the jedi and sith would use it. Since the fall of the jedi temple and the empire, I didn’t think I’d met a force user. Let alone be one. The jedi could mind trick anyone weak minded and the sith could shoot lightning from their fingertips. Maybe I can as well. Or would it be better to just let Rey kill this twilik?) You thought.

1111121121211111112.content:
Rey. Bring me to her. You said. What, are you trying get a cheap feel? Right in front of me? Rey said. While you crying your eyes out, something happened. You said. Like what? She said. Just do it. I need to know something. You said. Ok….. This better not be some joke. She said. Rey brought you to her. Ok.... let’s try this out. You said. You wave your hand. Valera. Listen to me. You don’t want to be here. You want to go back to where you came from and never come back to Jakku again. You said. As soon as you said that, her eyes shoot open and she stands up. Rey was ready with her staff, but Valera shows no hostile intent to her. I….can’t remember what I was doing here. But I do know I don’t want to come back. She said She quickly ran out and drove away in her speeder. T…T….Tyne……what did you just do?! She said stunned. So….i was right after all. You said. Tyne!? Rey said. Rey. I suggest you take a seat before I tell you. You said. Rey sits next to her counter and places you on it. Ok. What’s going on? She said.

Did you ever hear any stories about the force? You said. Not really. I heard stories about the republic before it became the empire. But not anything about the force. She said. Well, my mother always told me about force users when I was younger. How there was good ones and bad ones who could do incredible feats. She said. Feats? As in? She said. Shoot lightning from their fingers, choke, mind wipe people, push, pull, and all that. You said. So…. Can you do any of that? She said. I…..don’t know. I was surprised when it happened. She was close to shooting you, I just held out my hand hoping she wouldn’t. Next thing I know, she’s hitting that steel wall. You said. That was you? I thought I blacked out from anger and did that. Can you do it again? She said. I’ll….try to. You said. You hold up your arm and pick up a small metal pipe. Whoa. Tyne! Rey said. You drop the pipe. I can’t believe it. I’m in love with a force user! She said. So it this going to affect our relationship in any way? You said. Not in the slightest! I’ve loved you before this, I love you now. So what would you classify yourself as? She said. I’m not callous enough to be a sith, but I’m not virtuous enough to be a jedi. I guess we’ll find out where I stand sooner or later. You said. Sith or Jedi, I’ll stay by you. She said. Thanks. That makes this road a little easier. You said.


So is there a special type of training or something you need to go through? She said. I don’t think I’d fit for training. I don’t know if my body can handle it. But it would be awesome to have a lightsaber. You said. Well, you can’t just let all that just sit inside you. It’d be a waste. She said. I don’t even know how to use the force properly. And all the temptations that come with it. The sith seem at home with it. They aren’t afraid to use the force for their own, but to be so cold hearted and manipulative. I don’t think I can do that. The jedi are the keepers of peace and all, but I always thought they were hindering themselves by not using the full extent of the force. And they always wait to the last second to help. For once in my life, I don’t know what to do. You said. Well…. How about you get a feel of it first? She said. Like use it as I see fit? You said. Yeah. Use it how you want and see if you want to be either. And whatever you choose, I’ll be right there beside you. She said. I guess so….. You said. Come on. Don’t be so down. This is a good thing. Nothing will change between us. She said as she places you in her hand. It’s just……a lot to take in. You sure nothing will change? You said. Tyne, look at me. She said. You look up at her. I love you, Ok. Nothing will change between the two of us. Just as you said to me, I’m not leaving you. Ever! I loved you before this, I’ll love you after this. I’ll be by your side if you help the galaxy, I’ll be by your side if you turn your back on the galaxy. We’ll be good or evil together. She said. Even if I become a heartless menace or a righteous protector? You said. Yes. Whatever you become, I’ll be right there with you. Helping or hurting people. She said. ……We really don’t deserve each other. You said. But we’re together until the end of time! She said as she embraced you. Which….will be……sooner than…..expected…..if you don’t……ease up. You said through breaths. Sorry! She said. Rey lets go of you. You’re stronger than you look. You said. I….got carried away. She said. It’s…..ok. Just remember. Small body equals delicate. You said.

I think it'd be better not to

Well if I’m going to have the force, I might as well try to get use to it. I could practice on a few things around here. If that’s ok with you. You said. I don’t mind. Just try not to make a mess of things. She said. Just then, you heard a loud grumble. You look at Rey and then her stomach. Someone minds. Says” Feed me first.” You said. The flight to Nar Shaddaa was quiet until you spoke. Rey. You said. Yeah….? She said. I want to ask you something. You said. Go on. She said. You’ve killed before. How do you cope? You said. What makes you think I’ve killed before? She said. Back on Jakku, I saw tally marks on the wall next to your bench. There were a lot of them. More than I could count. You said.

Flashback

End of flashback.

How do you do it? You said. ……Those marks don’t represent kills. They are the days I’ve spent on Jakku. She said. And the blood? You said. I punched the wall out of anger and scrapped my knuckles. She said. That long, huh? You said. Longer than you know. But I have killed before. Only if I had to. In the life of a scavenger, I had to get use to it. She said. So how often was it? You said. Every now and then, I’d blast someone. I’ve only done it if it’s the last option. She said. What about me? Would you? You said. If I wanted you dead, I would have killed you by now. She said. Many ways to and opportunities. Maybe you’re just waiting for the right moment. You said. Are you serious right now? After all the time we spent, I could have. Eaten, stomped, suffocate, and all. But I didn’t because one: you aren’t a threat to me. Two: I’m not a psychopath. Three: I wanted to….keep you around. She said. Relax, Rey. Just pulling your leg. Trying to find a way to cope. Guess that means we’re both killers. First time I’ve taken a life. You said. Rey puts on the autopilot and places her hand next to you. You jump onto her hand and she brings you up.
