You stayed up for a while before finally heading back to sleep.

You wake up early in the morning. That dream…. You said. The image of your arm being rip off with such ease sent a chill down your spine. You get up and wait for Rey. You see Rey get up with a yawn. (She sleeps naked?) You thought. You still had that dream on your mind, that you didn’t pay that much attention to Rey being fully naked in front of you. Rey goes to her shower and comes out a few minutes later and gets dressed. She walks over to the counter you slept on. You’re up early. I thought you’d sleep in. She said. ……Maybe next time. You said. Are you alright? You look shaken. She said. When she reached for you, you took a step back. Tyne. Is something wrong? She said. You don’t say anything. Tyne. We were doing so good with each other. You were starting to trust me. She said. Rey could tell something was wrong with you. Did something happen last night? She said. …..No. You said. Rey’s bends down lower and you flinch when you saw her hands are placed next to you. Tyne, why are you so afraid of me now? She said. You can’t even look at her, which makes her even more concern. Tyne. I don’t want you scared of me. She said. I’m not….scared of you. You said. Then look at me and say that. She said. Slowly, you look up at her and see her concern face. Alright. Now tell me why are you so scared of me. She said. I…. You said. Tyne. Don’t you trust me? I kept you safe, nurse you back to health, treat you well. Why? Why are you acting like this? She said. You wanted to tell, you really did, but the dream left you shell-shocked.

Rey knew how you felt about being picked up, but she wanted to know why you were like this, so she picks you up. H….Hey! Put me down! You said. You guard your hurt arm out of fear, but Rey just puts you down in her hand. Your head was drenched in sweat from fear of your nightmare coming true. Rey could see the sweat dripping form your head. She knew you didn’t like it, but this was a new level. You weren’t just scared, you were terrified. Rey needed to calm you down if you were going to talk. You saw her index finger coming to you. You back up from her finger and protect your left arm. When you felt her finger touch you, you brace yourself. After a few seconds pass, you open your eyes to see her rubbing your back. The soothing feeling of her finger ease your nerves and slows your heart rate down a little. Seeing you calm down a little, Rey speaks. Tyne. You’re my friend. I don’t want you afraid of me. Whatever has you like this, just tell me. Please. I want to help ease your nerves. The way you’re acting makes me think you don’t want to be my friend anymore. She said.

112211121.content:
……Alright. I’ll tell. You said. Rey stops rubbing you so she could hear what you had to say. I had…..this dream about you. You said. A dream about me? She said. Don’t let your heart flutter just yet. It was….far from pleasant. You…. You said. I what? She said. You rip of my hurt arm and killed me. You said. WHAT!? Why would I do that?! She said. I guess a part of me still doesn’t fully trust you. You said. Why not? What have I done to make you not trust me? She said. Nothing. You done a lot for me. I guess it’s just a lingering suspicion. You said. Well, we’re just going have to get rid of that then. She said. What do you mean? You said. I’m going to help you trust me. You said. How? You said. Watch. She said. Rey walks to her speeder and drives to an area with downed starfighters and destroyed walkers. What are we doing here? You said. Scavenging. Plus, I want to show you how much I trust you. She said. Don’t know how you plan on accomplishing that out here, but if you say so. How can I help? You said. Walk around and see if anything here still works. She said. Ok. I think I can do that…. You said. Rey sets you down on the ground and you walk around looking for anything to salvage. You look to the side to see the open desert. A possible escape. Freedom. You look to see Rey is taking parts out of a Tie fighter. …..No. She doesn’t deserve that. You said. You go back to looking for parts. Hm. This A wing could have something valuable.You said. Before you could start, a shadow is cast over you. What the? You said before being pushed to the ground. You feel the hard material against your back. A boot? But who- Rey. What is she doing!? Is she really going to…. You said. There is no pressure being exerted on your body or anything. It’s just keeping you in place. At first, you were scared, but that feeling went away when you didn’t feel any force on you. You started to even feel somewhat safe and pat the boot a few times. It stays there on you for a few minutes until you feel it lift off you. As you stood, you are picked up carefully and placed down in Rey’s hand.

You ok? Rey said. I’m fine. What was that all about? You said. I said I was going to help you trust me. You’re scared of me crushing you, so I just repeated what I did. But what about that part about you trusting me? You said. I saw you looking out into the vast desert, and you turned your back. I trusted you not to run away from me. And you must trust me because I didn’t feel you fight against me. She said. I did feel…..safe after a few seconds. You said. See? It worked. She said. So the scavenging was a lie? You said. Not really. I did want to scavenge with you. She said. Well as long as step on the sand and not me. You said. That’s cruel. Depriving a girl of her fun. She said with a pout, making you both laugh. Come on. This stuff isn’t going to do itself. She said. I’ll help any way I can. You said. Rey places her hand next to you and you climb on. She lifts you up and brings you to a Y wing. I’ll start you off easy. Pull out the wires so I can dislodge the astro droid. She said. Easy enough. You said. Rey puts you down in the inner parts of the Y wing. Ok. I think it’s this….green one. You said. With your one good arm, you pull the wire and here a clack sound. Did it work? You shout. No. Pull another one. She said. Alright. The yellow one. You said. You pull the yellow one and hear something pop out. Now? You said. It worked. Grab my finger. She said. You see Rey’s finger come down and you latch on as tight as you could as Rey pulls you out.

With you in tow, Rey gets into her speeder and drives to the outpost. After reaching the outpost, Rey unloads everything she has. Ok. That’s done. And as for you…. She said with a smile as she picks you up. You’re not going to sell me, are you? You said. Depends on how well I do. A tiny human can sell for so much. She said. Well, it was fun while it lasted. You said. I’m joking, shorty. She said as she pats you lightly on the head. You’re with me now. So that means I take care of you. Now where to put you so no one steals you? She said. How about where I was last time? You said. Little perv. She teases. Rey places you in her cleavage and giggles from your movement. You position yourself as comfortably as you can so the heat from the sun and Rey won’t bother you much. Ok. That’s enough. Stay still down there. She said. Before long, customers start to come to her. You listen to the haggling and conversation, but the soft beating of Rey's heart lulls you to sleep.

Rey was making a killing on her salvage. She didn’t overcharge, but there was a lot of people coming to her. Once all her things were gone, Rey was counting her credits. 200…..300….450! Not a bad day. Now to get a few things. She said. Rey buys some food packs and stims before getting to her speeder and driving back home.

You were staring at her chest, which she caught onto. Keep staring and your eyes will fall out. She said. S….sorry. They’re just….. You said. Just what? She said. Bigger than I thought they were. 11221112111.content:
Quick note: I want to apologize if the first part of my last addition looks like it never ends. I copied and pasted from word and Writing didn't add the spaces i had. Hopeful this one will be easier to read for you. :)

Ugh…. You said as you woke up. Your slowly take in your surroundings as the sun light shines on you. You try to move, but can’t. Oh, yeah. You said. You rub Rey’s check until she wakes up. Morning already? She said as she sits up. She moves her hand in front of her. You slept well? She said. Yeah. No nightmare this time. You said. So you finally found your voice after i took it. She said. Well, I still had it. I just forgot how to form words. So what are we doing today? You said. I wanted you to decide. She said. Me? You said. We’re living together, so I might as well contribute somehow. I don’t want to seem like a parasite. You said. Who told you that? She said. Well….. After all you’ve done for me, I can return the favor somehow. No good deed goes unpunished. You said. Rey starts to rub your head. Listen, I don’t mind taking care of you. I don’t know where you got parasite from, but you’re not. You’re my friend. Not parasite. Friend. She said. I know, but it doesn’t sit well with me that you’re going out of your way for me and not getting anything. You said. I don’t want anything from you except your good health. We’ll go scavenging, but don’t think you have to pay me back. She said. Rey gets up and dresses in her scavenger outfit and drives to an Imperial star destroyer.

Ok. This area should have something of value. She said. X wings, Tie fighters, Interceptors, bombers, and a Star destroyer. We’re bound to find something. You said. You’re still new at this. So the star destroyer is out of the question. Rey said. Ok. Baby steps. Start small and work up from there. You said. Rey heads to a Tie fighter with a missing wing. Ok. I’ll take care of the outside of the ship. Can you pull out some wires from the inside for me? She said. You got it. You said. Rey puts you inside the fighter and you see most wires are fried. You pull out some wires and drag them to the opening. That’s all? She said. Most of them were fried in the crash. You said. It’ll work. She said as you walk onto her hand. Let’s try something a bit more complex. She said. Rey takes you to an X wing and sets you inside one of the engines. Ok. Go through here and disconnect the engines from their circuits. I’ll take care of the rest after that. She said. Give me a few minutes. You said. You head into the engine and come to the inner workings of the wing. Hm…. I think these red wires are it. You said. You pull out a few of them and you see one of the engines come out. You pull out more of them and Rey pops out all four of the engines. You jump down onto the soft sand. Banged up a little, but they run. Nice work in there. She said. For a few hours, you and Rey scavenge any good parts you both can find.

So how am I doing? You said as Rey sits on the ground. Pretty good. You don’t let your size slow you down or a hurt arm. How’d you turn on that Tie fighter? She said. I crossed a few wires. Tuned off the weapons for extra engine power and on came the engines. She said. Got the engine working, dislodged the weapons, and took out a astro droid. You sure you haven’t done this before? She said. First time. You said. She takes a drink of water and pours you some. You take a sip. We’ve been out here for hours. You think we have enough? You said. More than. Any more and my speeder won’t move. She said. Call it an early day? You said. Yeah. She said. Rey gets up and drives her speeder to the outpost. Rey unloads all her stuff. You know the drill. She said. Out of sight. You said. Rey tucks you away in her cleavage before she starts selling. You hear Rey engage in multiple conversations and wonder what her clientele are like. You climb up and stick your head out. As you’re getting a good look, you are pushed back down. I take that as a no. You said.

Within a couple of hours, all of Rey’s salvage is gone. She makes sure no one is looking and pulls you out. Why were you trying to get out? She said. I wasn’t trying to get out. I wanted to see what kind of people you sell to. You said. Yeah. Having your head stick out from between my chest while I do business is a good idea. She said. Was I that noticeable? You said. You’re lucky I felt you moving or someone would have saw you. She said. Well, how did we- I mean you, do? You said. You had it right the first time. And we made 435 in credits. She said. That much?! Are you asking for an arm and leg too? You said. No. I don’t overcharge people. Just a lot of people come to me. And I have what they want. She said. Well, a good day of business calls for a celebration. You said. I think you’re right. She said. Rey heads into the cantina and sits at an open table. Think you can get past two this time? She said. Just wait. I know what I’m up against now. You said. Rey orders her drink and downs it in one go. Show off. You said. You and Rey both drink and joke with each other until you call quits after 4. Wow. Two more than last time. She said. Just….*hic* wait till I get a tolerance*hic* like you. You’ll be the one seeing triple. You said. I’m actually surprised you can drink a normal glass size at your size. She said. Maybe…..I still eat and drink the same amount as normal sized person. *hic*. You said. Right. I’ll pay off the bartender. You try and not stumble off the table. She said. Don’t worry your pretty self about me. You go and *hic* take care of stuff. You said. Pretty. I wonder if that’s him or the drinks talking. Rey said with a blushed face. Rey gets up to pay the bartender.

While she’s gone, a cloaked figure approaches the table. So I was right. I knew I saw that girl talking to a tiny person earlier. They said. And? You never seen a *hic* thumb sized person before? You said. No. I haven’t. Which is why you’re coming with me. She said. They reach for you and pick you up. From the softness of the hand, you can tell it’s a human lady. Hey, lady. I’m not going anywhere with you. You said. I don’t think you’re in a position to argue. Whether drunk or sober, you are coming with me. And I think your friend is better off without you. She said. She stuffs you in her robe’s pocket and walks out of the cantina.

Alright. I’ve paid. Let’s get- Tyne? Rey said. She doesn’t see you on the table. D….Did he? No. Even in a stupor, he’s not crazy. She said. Rey heads outside and sees you’re not in the speeder. No…. He couldn’t have been…. She said. With her teeth gritted and a one hand clenched into a fist, Rey grabs her staff. Tyne….. Just hang on. I’m coming for you. She said. Holstering her weapon, Rey runs through crowds of people to find you.

Who can barely stand, yet you are my ticket of this dirtball. She said. You really think someone would *hic* pay for me? You said. Handsomely. You said. You…won’t get away with this. You said. I’ve been searching for you. She said. Well, I wasn’t playing a game of hide and seek. I was taken. You said. I know. I turn my back for one second. I’m not letting you out of my sights again. She said. Rey reaches for you, but stops when a voice calls out. Unless you pay for him, step aside. It said. Oh no. You said. The hooded woman comes back. Pay? Has the heat fried your brain or something? You took him! Rey argued. Not my fault you left him there. You were basically saying take him. She said. Now I’m saying give him back! He not yours! Rey said with her staff ready. Put that away. Like you’re not already causing a scene. She said. It’ll be more than a scene if you don’t hand him over! Rey said. Look. We’re both reasonable people here. Let’s try and talk this out. She said. There’s nothing to talk about! Hand him over, NOW! Rey said. Do you want more people to know about him? Lower your voice! She said. I hate to say it, but she’s right. I don’t want everyone to know about me. You said. ……Alright. For you, Tyne. Rey said. See. Now let’s talk about like rational people. The lady said.

What do you want with him? Rey said. Simple: Off this dirtball. Your friend is my ticket. She said. You plan on selling him?! Rey said. A tiny human’s got to be worth something. She said. He’s a person! Not some object to give away! Rey said. If you feel so strongly about it, you can take him. For a price. She said. You’re going to be that greedy? You said. Call it what you want, but I’m getting off this dustball one way or another. She said. How much are you going to charge for me anyway? You said. If she considers you a friend, she’d give up all her credits. She said. You must be suffering from a heat stroke. Rey wouldn’t-Done. Rey interrupts. You look up at her. Rey. That’s all the credits you’ve been saving plus made during selling. You said. I can make it all back. Here. Take it and go. Rey said. She drops all her credits on the table. You must care a lot about him. Maybe even more than a friend. But that’s not my concern. A pleasure doing business. She said. Rey picks you up and heads to her speeder. She hops in and drives back home. It was a quiet ride. Neither of you said anything until Rey gets home. She hops out and slumps down against wall.

Why? You said. Why what? She said. Why’d you give up all your earnings for me?! You said. Because you’re my friend. She said. You don’t give up all your life savings just for a friend. That’s something you do for a…. Wait. D-Do you see me more than a friend? You said. ……Maybe. What of it? She said. What do you mean “Maybe.”? You said. Maybe I see you as just a friend or maybe I see you more than a friend. She said. You’re not making any sense. You said. Can’t you be happy that I got you back from that woman? She said. I am! But I want to know why you gave up every last credit just for me. You said. Because you’re my friend! Like I keep telling you! She said. Nobody gives up their life saving like that. Not for a friend. That’s something you do for a love one. You said. Then it hits you. Rey…… Do you….love me? You said. Rey looks away from you. You just can’t leave well enough. She said. If you just tell me, I would. You said. I told you already! She said. Who are you trying to convince? Me? Or you? You said. I’m not trying to convince anyone! I said I did it because you’re my friend. You can take it or leave it, but I’m done talking about it. She said. ……Alright. Fine. You did it for a friend. Nothing more, nothing less. You said.

The rest of the day went by normally, except you and Rey didn’t speak to each other and gave each other distance. With the heated conversation, you think it’s for the best for now. When night came, you decided to sleep in your makeshift bed. You were about to drifted off when you are picked up and placed on a soft pillow. You look at her as she lays down. You want to say something, but bit your tongue and just went back to sleep with your back to her. While you were sleeping, Rey sat up and looked at you sleeping.

Damn it….. Why couldn’t I just tell him? She said. Rey put her head in her hands. She did see you more than as a friend, but she couldn’t bring herself to say it. At first, she saw you as a friend, but as she started to care for you more and more, a deeper feeling had formed in her heart. She knew it when you had called her pretty. She played it off as you being in a stupor, but her heart was pounding hard. There’s no way it can happen now. He probably hates me now. With good reason. I lied straight to his face, and I’d be lucky if he speaks to me. Let alone even look at me. Stupid! Stupid! Stupid! She said. She was kicking herself over her chance at something more being gone. And after the way I talked to him, why would he even forgive me? What if he just ups and leaves me by myself? I'll be right back where i started. Alone. She said. Tears were forming in her eyes, but she held them back. I need to apologize to him. He forgave me after I hurt him. Maybe he'll forgive me again. But after all I said, he won’t listen. I need to show I’m sorry. She said.

Just as she said that, an idea pop into her head. Rey gently turned you over on your back. He’s had fantasies about me. Maybe…. If I make one of them come true, he’ll forgive me. She said. Rey wanted you to forgive her, but is this the best way for it?

I know where this is going.) You thought. In fact, I am a little hungry. And I have the perfect snack. She said. Rey brings you closer and licks you from head to toe. Mmmm. Tasty! Might be a tough swallow with all those clothes on, but you'll go down in the end. She said. Rey opens her mouth and holds you close. Heh heh! I’m gonna eat you! She said in a singsong voice. (She's really enjoying this bet.) You thought. Rey licks you a few more times before dropping you. You freefall and land right onto her puckered up lips. You stay there for a second before Rey picks you up.

Why weren’t you scared? I went out of my way to make that convincing. She said, pouting. I knew what you were going to do when you said could. You said. Awww. It’s no fun when you know what I’m going to do. She said. I'll try and act surprised next time. You said. Rey gets up and heads to the counter. She sits you down and injects you with a stim. Ok. How does your arm feel? She said. You take the sling off and move your left arm around. Like it was never hurt to begin with. Thanks! You said. Don’t mention it. She said. I owe you….. Well, everything I have. If I could give you my name, I would. I’ll pay you back every credit somehow. You said. I don’t want you to. It was my fault for hurting you in the first place, so it’s was my responsibility to take care of you. She said. But I didn’t want you spend your credits on me. They are hard enough to come around on this planet. A cute girl like you should keep her credits. You said. Flattery won’t change my mind, shorty. She said, smiling. Let me just….think of a way at least. I don’t want you to think I don’t appreciate you. You said. Tyne….. ……Alright. But if you can’t think of anything, then don’t bother. I’m perfectly fine. She said. Whatever mistress says. You said. And don’t you forget it. She said, poking you. Rey puts on her clothes and you climb onto her hand. She heads to her speeder and drives to the outpost.

What are we doing here? She said. I need to get a few things for us. Stay here. She said. Rey hops out and goes into one of the many shops. Ok. How can I pay her back? You said. While you were thinking, a voice broke your concentration. Still around? So she does care. A familiar voice said. Oh. It’s you. You said. You look to see it’s the hooded lady who tried to sell you. Seems like I was right. She does care for you more than a friend. She said. Yeah. Pat yourself on the back. Weren’t you suppose to be gone by now? You said. I’m well on my way out. My flight arrives in a few minutes. Thought I see if you were still around. She said. Whatever. Look. I need some help and you seem to know this planet well. You said. Too well. But what do you need from me? I tried to sell you. Remember? She said. I know, and I’ve gotten over it. I want to pay Rey back for her kindness, but I can’t think of anything. Do you know anything at all that would be good? You said. Well..... Normally I don’t do this, but I can make an exception for you. You’ve seen that destroyed star destroyer? She said. Multiple times. You said. On board there is an artifact of the Emperor Palpatine. It was bound for his vault of conquests, but it was shoot down when the Empire and Rebellion fought over Jakku. If you can find it, you can sell it and make a grand fortune. She said. A grand fortune….. That will be more than enough. What’s it look like? You said. You know what a holocron looks like? She said. Yeah. They come in different shapes. You said. It’s a square one. Find it and it’s yours. She said. Hold on…. If you knew about this artifact, why didn’t you go for it? You said. I did, but couldn’t find it. Maybe you’ll have better luck. She said. Can’t believe I’m saying this to you, but thanks. You said. Now, if you don’t mind, my flight is her. She said. She heads onto a shuttle just as Rey walks out.

I got what we needed. We’ll be good for this week and next. She said. Rey….. I need to ask you something. What is it? She said. Can…..we go scavenge the star destroyer? You said. I know you’re eager for it, but I don’t think you’re ready yet. She said. But I know I can do it. I’ve taken out weapons systems, targeting computers, even engines. I can handle that destroyer. Just give me a chance at it. You said. Rey remains quiet for a few seconds. …..Ok. We’ll scavenge that destroyer, but I’m tacking on an extra day to our bet. She said. I won’t disappoint, and I'll be very careful. You said. Rey starts up her speeder and drives to the star destroyer. Ok. We’re here. She said. You climb onto her hand and she gets out. Rey walks into the giant hole in the hull of the ship. So this is Imperial engineering? I’ll give them credit, they know how to build a ship. She said. Rey stops when she gets to engineering and sees intact, but deactivated droids. We can start here. I’m take apart these droids. You see if these consoles work. She said. Got it. You said. Rey puts you down on the console and starts to take apart the droids. You jump down from the console and quickly leave. Ok. Now to find that artifact. If it goes well, I can pay back Rey every single credit she spent. Maybe even enough to get her off this planet. You said. You start looking around for the artifact.
11221112111111111.title: How to pay back a debt

112211121111111111.content:
You walk down the corridor and squeeze through a partial open sliding door. Ok. I have to look quickly. It won’t take her long to dismantle those droids. You said. You look around what looks like a quarter for troopers. Wouldn’t be where they keep the troopers. I’m just wasting time. You said. You squeeze back through the door. You head down the corridor and take a right and go through the blown open door. This seems like storage. Maybe here. You said. You look around and check in the overturned metal boxes, but find nothing. Damn. It’s not here. You said. You look around and see the blown holes in the metal floor. A chance it fell in one of these holes, but which one? You said. As you were contemplating, you heard rapid footsteps. She’s done already? Damnit! You said. From the sounds of the footsteps, they were heading your way. You quickly chose a hole at random and jump down.

You fall down and land hard on the metal linings and wires. Oh…… That hurt….. You said. You slowly get up and hit your head on a metal pipe. Ow! You said. You take a step and fall to the ground. You rub your head as your sense come back. Ugh. How am I going to find that artifact? You said. You lean against something when you meant to fall over. What the? You said. You look to see that you’re laying against the artifact. T…..the artifact! You said joyfully. You take a breath of relief. Ok. I’ve found it. Now I need to get it out. I think I can push it. You said. With all your strength, you manage to move the artifact. You keep pushing and pushing until you get tired and take five. If my knowledge is correct, the metal lining around here, I should be around the hanger or the engines. You said. You brace against the artifact and start pushing. You push and push until the artifact falls down onto a catwalk. You fall down and land on top of it. Ok. Now to just push this thing until I come across Rey. Judging from where I am, I’d say I’m where the hanger used to be. You said. You get back to pushing it across the catwalk and into the hanger overlook. Not that far to go. You said. You push some more and take a break. This thing better be worth a lot of credits. You said. You hear rapid footsteps at you start pushing. Rey! You said. Tyne?! Tyne!! Where are you!? She said. Rey looks around feverishly for you. I knew I shouldn’t have agreed with him! If something happened to him….. Tyne!! She shouts. Rey looks around and sees a square, glowing object moving to her. What…..is that? She said. Rey picks up the object and sees you hanging on. Tyne!! She said. Rey plucks you off the artifact and hugs you tightly. I should go missing more often. You said.

Where did you go!? Do you have any idea what was going through my mind!? Or how worried I was!? She said. Well, I was thinking of way to pay you back. An old acquaintance of ours told me about an artifact of great wealth. You said. You didn’t…. She said. I know, but if I’d told you, you wouldn’t come here. And I wanted to get back ever single credit you lost. It was wrong of me to lie to you. You said. And? She said. And dangerous to look alone in a giant ship. You said. And? She said. And I’d should have dropped the whole thing from the beginning. You said. And? She said. And I’m sorry for making you worry about me. You said. Rey looks at the artifact. You gave me a heart attack over this object; so you can pay back all the credits I willingly and happily spent on you. Am I right? She said. When you say it, it sounds horrible. You said. It is! I said you didn’t have to do this. She said. I know…. You said. …..How much did she said it would be worth? Rey said. A grand fortune. It looks grand in value, so I though it would get you all your credits back plus enough for a ticket off this planet. If you wanted to. I just….wanted to return the favor. You said. *Sigh* Your heart was in the right place at least. Plus, I can’t stay mad at you, shorty. You’re just too cute for it! She said. So….you forgive me? You said. Promise to never do something like this again? She said. Never again. Mistress's word is law. You said, making her laugh. With you on her shoulder, Rey heads out of the destroyer and to her speeder and drives to the outpost.

I wasn’t planning on selling today, but if you’re positive that this will net a fortune, I’ll do it. I’ll wait in the speeder. You said. Rey sets down the few items she had plus the artifact. You wait a while until Rey comes back. Before you could say anything to her, she picks you up and barrages you with kisses. Whoa! Whoa! Rey! You said, between kisses. You were right!! It was worth a fortune! She said. H….how much was it? You said. The person bought it for ten thousand! She said. That much!?! You said stunned. Too much to carry home, so I had to get an account. And it’s all thanks to you! She said, kissing you again. Who was the person? You said. It was some archaeologist sort. He saw the thing, and said it was a real sith holocron. Offered ten thousand credits for it, and gave me a finders fee as well. She said. So you made ten thousand plus off that thing? You said. Because of your insistent of paying me back. Thank you! She said. So no need to stay out here anymore. You said. Rey gets in and drives back home.

Ten thousand credits….. Never have I’d imagine making or seeing that much. She said.That should more than cover my debt to you. You said. I know you wanted to Tyne, buy you never owed me. I told you it was my responsibility because I hurt you. The only thing I wanted was you in good health. She said. I didn’t want to seem ungrateful. I mean. A pretty scavenger nurse me back to health and spends her hard earned credits on me and gets nothing back? Not in my books. You said. You have a big heart. And that’s a rare thing on Jakku. She said. Call it a good upbringing. So what are you going to do with all those credits? You said. I’ll think about it later. Right now….. She said, picking you up. You owe your mistress for lying to her and giving her a panic attack. She said. O…of course, mistress. What do you need? You said. You’re going to…..
112211121111111111.title: Squared

1122111211111111111.content:
You’re going to please me. You have no idea how stressed I was when you up and left. I need to relax. In a special way. She said, winking at you. I’m…..not following, mistress. You said. Come on. Use that brain in there. A special way. She said. You think for a minute. Oh…. OH! You mean like!? You said. You bet your cute head. She said. H…how would I even…. You said. Use that imagination of yours. She said. I….don’t think my body would handle that. You said. You’re selling yourself short. Plus, I know you’ve dreamed of it. She said. In my dreams, I’m normal size doing it. You said. The experience will be better at that size. She said. I…. You said. You have to. Remember? She said. As….mistress commands. You said. Don’t worry. I’ll be very gentle with you. She said. Rey undress and walks over to her bed. Come on. Lose the clothes. She said. You take off all your clothes. Ready? She said. You take a few breaths and give a thumbs up. Rey moves you past her waist line and to her womanhood and shoves you in. Ah! She said.

You regain your senses from the forceful thrust. I…I’m in her…..! You said stunned. You notice that it was a tight squeeze. Never thought I’d be inside a woman like this. You said. You can hear Rey moaning as you gather yourself. If I want out, I have to play. You said. You crawl deeper inside her, making her moan more. Ohhhh…. Yes…. Rey said, in bliss. She’s enjoying this. If I don’t drown or die from the pressure in here, I might try this again. You said. Your movement was causing Rey more stimulation than she thought. Yes! I’m almost there!! She said. You had reach the sweet spot when you saw a rush of juice coming your way. ……Shit. You said. You are washed away and pushed out as Rey reaches climax. You land on the bed as Rey catches her breath. Have…..to….do that…..again sometime. She said. You breath hard and cough out juice. Man…. That was an experience….. You said. As you get to your feet, you are picked up and dried off.

How was it? She said. Not how I imagine my first time. You said. You were amazing. I feel completely relax now. Good job. She said. Whatever mistress says. Are you pleased? You said. Very. We have to do that again sometime. She said. You jump from her hand to put your clothes on. So what now, mistress? You said. I can think of one thing. She said. Rey hoisted you up by your leg and are dangles you over her face. She brings you close and starts kissing you. R….Rey? You said. Shhhh. Relax, and enjoy yourself. You’ve done a lot for me. Now it’s my turn. She said. Rey barrage you with kisses, and with each one she gave you, giggled as your face got redder and redder. Awww! You’re so cute with a red face! She said. She kisses you a few more times, then holds you against her chest in a hugging manner. M....mistress. What brought this on? You said. For being a good sport and cute as a button, you deserve a reward. She said. Rey holds you there for a few minutes before she stands up. She walks over to the counter and put you down.

Hungry? She said. A little….. You said. A little? I can hear your stomach from here. She said. Right on cue, your stomach growled loudly. Ok. I am. You said. Uh-huh. Your mistress knows her tiny servant. She teases as she pokes you. Rey takes out and heats up one of the food packs. Once it was done, she gives you a few pieces and you scarf them down. Wow. You must have been starving. She said. Rey gives you a few more pieces until you couldn’t eat anymore. Full? She said. Yeah. I can’t eat any more. You said. You burp loudly. You look up at Rey and she laughs. She lets out a loud burp as well and you both laughed. Once you both were done, you climb onto her hand and she takes you back to her bed.

What does mistress have planned now? You said. To keep playing with you. Day’s not over just yet. She said. May I ask how? You said. Maybe another trip down there….. You were so wonderful. She said, smiling. Uh….. Can we do that another time? You said. What’s the magic word? She said. Please, mistress? You said. Alright. Because you asked nicely. Plus, I have other ideas of fun we can have. She said. Are…..they safe ideas? You said. Of course they are. I don’t want anything to happen my little boyfriend. She said. If mistress says so. You said. And don’t forget it. She said. Rey places you on the ground and places her feet next to you. Climb me. She said. Mistress? You said. You heard me. Climb me like a mountain. And as an incentive, I’ll let you decide your reward. She said. I get to decide? You said. It can be anything, and I mean anything, you want. She said seductively. Watching you stand there stunned, Rey giggles. Don’t just stand there. Don’t you want your reward? She said.

You grab onto her toe when you stopped. You got an idea. Rey was enjoying herself and you were as well, but you wanted to have some fun of your own. You wanted to see how she would react to you refusing her. She is a nice a reasonable person, so you hope she would see you just playing. Do you go with your idea or keep playing it safe?
1122111211111111111.title: please me

11221112111111111112.content:
You smile and wait. Rey was waiting for you to start climbing her, but she saw that you haven’t moved. Is something wrong? She said. No. You said. So why haven’t you started yet? She said. Don’t want to. You said. What do you mean by that?! You lost the bet. She said. And that means…..? You said. It means you have to listen and do what I say! She said. I….don’t remember agreeing to that. You said. You….. Ohhhh. I see what you’re doing. She said. Doing what? You said, smiling. Rey lifts you up by the leg and holds you in front of her grinning face. So you’re rebelling against your mistress, huh? She said. Yeah. I had enough. You said. And you think I will just let you go against me? You’re mine to own and play with as I see fit. Someone needs a reminder of what I can do to him. She said. I’m not scared of you. Do your worst. You said. I intend to. Seems like someone forgot their place. Such disobedience needs to be punished. She said. Rey toss you into her mouth.

You land onto her moist tongue. Mmmmm! She said. Rey tosses you onto her teeth and holds them close to you, especially her incisor, which is near your head. Then tilts her head to the side and you roll onto her tongue. She licks you multiple times and tilts her head back and you slide to her throat, but she tilts her head forward and you slide and fall right onto her hand. Enjoyed your little trip? She said. Oh….. Anyone catch the number of that freighter? You said. See how easy it is? I can swallow you with little effort. You’ll be nothing but a piece of candy. I’ll enjoy you, then swallow you. Still want to rebel against me? She said. You look up to see her smile and wink at you. Heh…. I’m not scared of your mouth or a little acid bath. You said. Want to test that theory? She said. She opened her mouth and brought you to it, but pull you away. On second thought, No…. You don’t deserve the privilege of becoming a part of me. You deserve something else. She said. She thinks for a few seconds before getting an idea. Rey drop you onto the ground. As you stand up, a shadow is cast over you. You look up to see her bare foot coming down on you, and pinning you under her big and second toe.

Remember this? You almost died as an insignificant bug under my boot. This time, I’ll finish the job. She said. Rey adds a little pressure to your body. Ohhhh. You feel good under my foot. I wonder how your guts and blood will feel on them? She said, smiling evilly. You wouldn’t…..! You said. Rey lifts and hovers her foot a few feet above you. Think I won’t? I crush bugs like you on a daily basis. Preferably barefoot, so I can feel their bodies crunch under me. You’ll join them too. Unless you resubmit to my authority. She said. You could see Rey was holding back her smile and laughter as she acted out. (She’s enjoying this fake rebellion I’m doing. Making mistress happy.) You thought. So. Are you going to submit? Or do you and my foot want to be the closet of friends? She said. Go ahead and kill me. Cause I’m not going back. You said. Have it your way. She said. You roll out the way as her foot hits the ground. Think I’ll make it that easy? Have to catch me first. You said. You run away just as Rey stands up. You’re not getting away from me! She said.

You ran and hid behind some fallen pieces of metal as Rey passed by. You can’t hide forever. She said, smiling. She’s loving this. You said. Rey looks in her bathroom, the kitchen, and on her shelf. Running out of hiding spots, Tyne. It’s won't be long before i find you. She said. (This is much more fun than what I had plan. Shorty knows how to entertain his mistress.) She thought. Rey searches up and down the inside of the AT-AT, but comes up empty. Where did you go, Tyne? She said. As she thought, her eyes come to the few items on the ground. Under my nose the entire time. She said. Rey picks up the items one by one. You know she will soon find you, so you ran from behind your hiding spot and bolt for a new one; hoping Rey didn't see you.
11221112111111111112.title: Playfully refuse

112211121111111111122.content:
Rey picked up the metal piece, but you weren’t there. What? I was for sure. Where are you, shorty? She said stunned. From your new hiding spot, you chuckle. She’s cute when she’s surprised. You said. You digged a hole in a small sand mound and watched as Rey looked around for you. With each step she took, the mound shaked. Having a giant, naked woman looking for you…. Is that a good thing? You said. You peaked out to see her still looking. Where would I hide if I was his size? She said. Rey’s massive feet were right in front of your spot. Can’t be that many places he could get into. She said. Rey walks away and you laugh. As the minutes tick by, you saw her looking and coming up empty. You’re only making this worse on yourself! She said. This is getting good. I’ll wait a few more minutes before coming out. You said. When you peaked out, you had saw Rey’s knees where on the ground, right in front of your spot. Uh-oh. You said. I know you’re hiding in there. If I have to dig you out, you won’t like it. She said. She’s bluffing. You said. Rey waits for a minute, but you don’t come out. Don’t say I didn’t warn you. She said. Rey digs through the sand mound until her hand feels something. Gotcha! She said. Rey brought her hand up and open it. Found you, little rebel. She said. Oh boy. You said. You rebelled against your mistress. There’s only one punishment for a crime like that. She said. Rey closes her hand around you and gets up. After walking and sitting down on her bed, she opens her hand up.

Now to punish you. She said. You brace for whatever when you felt something being pressed against you. You open one eye to see Rey is kissing you. Your punishment is one thousand kisses of death! She said. D…..death? You said. Rey kisses you multiple times; assaulting you with soft lips. I’ll kiss you until you go limp. She said. With each kiss Rey gives you, you found it hard to breath. Rey saw this and stops. It’s getting hard to breath, huh? This is what happens to disobedient servants. She said. She then gives you one long kiss that literally took your breath away. *Gasp* Gasp* You…. You said. They’ll only get longer and longer, little rebel. Each one cutting it closer and closer. She said. You regain your breath and look up at her. Since you were a good servant, I’ll make this offer once. Resubmit to your mistress….. or be kissed to death. She said. Knowing that you’re beat, you give up. I submit to you, mistress. I’m sorry for rebelling. You said. That’s a good boy. She said, smiling victoriously.

Rey kisses you on the head. I had so much fun! Was that your plan from the get go? She said. Wanted to see how you’d react to me refusing. You were enjoying yourself. You said. I was enjoying the game, although it killed me inside to threaten you. But I had a role to fill. And It was so fun and cute watching you fight back. She said. Same to you. You really got into it. You said. What kind of mistress lets her servant defy her? She said, rubbing your head. A bad one? You said. Right. And I’m no bad mistress. My little servant will listen to me. She said. As you say, mistress. You said with a bow. That’s my obedient shorty. She said, kissing you.

Now what would you like your reward to be? She said. You’re…..still offering that? You said. For the fun game you made me play? Of course. So. What does my little boyfriend want? It can be anything you desire. She said. Anything? I….don’t know. You said. There must be something you want. She said. Well, if you’re going to play that, I need to find a way to repay you. You said. Oh, no. You promised not to do something crazy for me. She said. Crazy. You didn’t say anything about normal. She said. You know what I meant by that promise, shorty. Do I have to pull rank? She said. No. I understand mistress’s word. And her word is law. You said. Such a good servant. Now. Why don’t you tell your mistress what you desire. She said. I….can’t ask anything of you. I already owe you everything I have. You said. What did your mistress say about you owing her? She said. That it’s unnecessary and all she wants is my good health. You said. And that’s final. I don’t want you owing me. She said. As you say, mistress. So come on. I’m waiting on your answer. She said. W…well….
112211121111111111122.title: Rey didn't see you

1122111211111111111222.content:
I can’t think of anything except one thing. You said. What is it? Don’t be ashamed. She said. What i want from you is your happiness. Just seeing you smile is enough for me. You said. Rey chuckles at your comment as she rubs your head. Why do you have to be so thoughtful? She said. It’s just me. Plus, I can’t ask a pretty girl for a favor. I’ll look bad. You said. To who? The other little people? She said. You never know. They could be around. You said. So I have more little people in and around my home? She said. I’m sworn to secrecy. You joke. Secrecy, huh? I demand you tell me if there are others! She said. Demand? On whose authority? You said. Your mistress. She said. ……Damn. You said. So? Are there more little people around? She said, smiling. No, mistress. They’re aren’t. You said. That’s a good servant. Now, come kiss your mistress. She said. Rey brings you to her face and you walk up to her lips and she kisses you. You’re enjoying this power, aren’t you? You said. A little. She said. Rey places you on her pillow as she lays right next to you. I want you to stay right here tonight, so in the morning, you’re the first thing I see. She said. As mistress says. You said. Rey places her hand over you. She kisses you on the head before you both fall asleep.

Morning.

Rey wakes up, but doesn’t see you in her hand. She thought she was dreaming, but as her vision became clear, she wasn’t dreaming. Tyne? She said a little frantic. Rey then felt something moving between her breast. Rey blushes as she looks to see you down there, snuggling against her breast. There you are. She said as she fishes you out. Oh, Tyne…. Wake up…. Your mistress needs you. She said, with a smile. You turn over and hug Rey’s index finger, and she giggles. Just when I thought you couldn’t get any cuter. She said. Rey pokes you a few times, but you don’t stir. How do I wake up a tiny? She said. Rey heads to her shower and turns on the water, but it was ice cold. Wakey wakey! She said. Rey holds you in the shower as the cold water washes over you. Whoa! You said as you grip her finger tighter and shiver. Rey giggles as she turns off the water. R…..r……rey? W…..was this your…..doing? You said, freezing. Me? No! She said with an innocent smile. I….innocent as…..a b….baby wampa rat. You said. Rey walks to her the counter and takes off your clothes.

Let those dry so you don’t freeze to death. She said. Now I’m c….cold and naked. You said. And? She said. Still not use to it. You said. Why not? I get to see you in all, and I mean all, your glory. She said. You start to sweat a little. For some reason, I’m not cold anymore. You said. So I don’t need to do this? She said. Rey picks you up and hugs you. W….what are you!? You said, shocked. Isn’t it obvious? I’m warming you up with my body heat. She said. H….hold on a second. Did you have this all planned out?! You said. Nope. And that’s the best part! You. Me. Naked and in each other’s arms. I love it when things work out for me in the end. She said. T….this girl is either smart or lucky. You said. Being held against her warm body, It didn’t take long before your body temperature returned to normal.

I think that’s enough Rey. You said. Aww. But I’m enjoying this. My body heating up your body….. Aren’t you enjoying this? She said. As much as I love being right next to your breast, I don’t want to suffocate or over heat. You said. Can’t have that. Who else will I find cute? She teases. Rey lets go of you. Speaking of being there…. Why were you there when I told you to stay in my hand? She said. I….got cold last night. I’m talking about teeth clattering cold. So I wormed out from your hand and went to the only warm spot I could get to. I wouldn’t disobey mistress if it was anything else. You said. Hmmm…. You disobeyed a command from your mistress.... Which is unacceptable. She said. Rey pokes you and you fall over. But..... Since you've been on the up and up after your little rebellion, I think I can forgive your disobedience this one time. She said. Thank you, mistress. You said. For my leniency, you owe me a kiss. She said. Rey holds you to her lips and you kiss them. Such a good little one. She said.

So…. Does mistress have anything plan? You said. I have a few things plan. Things that we're going to enjoy. She said. We are? What are they? You said. Use your imagination. I’ll give you a hint, though. Just you *Kiss* and me. She said seductively. Since when did you have a dirty mind? You said. I have a little boyfriend now. So I need to make sure he’s happy. She said. Guess that means I need to make sure my titaness girlfriend is happy as well. You said. With you, I can’t be anything but happy. She said. Then I’ll make you happier. You said. You’re about to…. Unless you want me to go first. She said.

Her moans got quicker and quicker as you find a sweet spot and agitate it. YES!! She said. I am to please. You said. I’m….far from pleased. You’ve outdone yourself. What did you do different to make it better than last time? She said. When I found your sweet spot, you weren’t the only one getting pleasure out of it. You said. You mean you…..right inside me? She said. Mistress wanted to be pleasured. I didn’t want to fail her. You said. You’re so dedicated! She said. Rey gives you multiple kisses before stopping. But what am I going to do for you? My plans went out the window now. She said. I….have an idea. She then does a sharp turn and shakes her body before crouching down to your level and kiss you.

Did you like my dance? She said. I….had no idea you could dance like that. You said. For a certain someone, whose name starts with a T and who I love dearly, I’ll do anything they want me to do. She said. So you’ve been seeing someone else behind my back? You said, smiling. His name is Tyne. He’s cute, considerate, kind, and I can put him in my pocket. She said. Don’t stop there. Keep the complements coming. You said. Don’t get a big head, shorty. She said. Rey gives you a passionate kiss, licking you a few times before breaking it. I love you. She said. I love you too, Re- I mean, mistress. You said. Giggling at your mistake, she gets up and puts her clothes on and redo her hair.

We’re going somewhere? You said. Just because I have 10,000 credits, doesn’t mean I can get complacent. She said. Fair enough, but I thought you’d get off this planet. You said. Don’t get me wrong, I want to. But what will I do? Scavenging is all I know. She said. You could be a dancer. You’d put all those Twi’lek dancers to shame. You said. I don’t think so. That’s only for your eyes only. She said. How about becoming a bounty hunter? You go the attitude and fighting skills. And you'd never have to worry about credits again. You said. Hmm. I get to travel and see the galaxy, but..... I don't like the concept of being paid to kill. She said. Rey picks you up and rubs your head. I like that you're thinking about me, but don’t worry about me, alright? As long as I have my tiny boyfriend, I’ll be fine. She said. Ok…. You said. Rey puts you down her cleavage and makes sure you’re perfectly secure. Wait. You’re not going to let me put my clothes on? You said. I like feeling your skin on mine. Don’t you won’t to feel my breast in all their softness without those pesky clothes getting in the way? She said. They do feel softer without them….. You said. Then it’s settle. 11221112111111111112221.title: I'll go first

112211121111111111122212.content:
Ok. Should find something of value here. She said. Rey hops out of the speeder and surveys the area. Looks like no one’s been here. She said. Rey walks up to one of the many down fighters and starts taking it apart. It’d go a lot faster if I’d help. You said. No. You’re not dressed for this kind of work. You'll hurt yourself. She said. Have a feeling you left my clothes on purpose….. You said. Ding! She said. For a scavenger, you’re smarter than you look. You said. I’ll take that as a compliment. She said. For an hour or so, Rey takes apart a few fighters and only takes the parts that are valuable or still works. After a while, she takes a seat against the back of an x wing and takes you out. Are you done? You said. No. Just resting. Plus, I wanted to do this. She said. Rey brings you closer to her and kiss you. Feeling her soft lips on you made you forget about the bearing heat.

What brought that on? You said. You’re so cute like this, it’d be a crime not to kiss you! She said. Well, my cuteness is nothing compared to your beauty. You said. *Laugh* Quit it. I’m a mess. Covered in sweat and sand…. You think I’m beautiful. She said, blushing. I’m mostly covered in sweat and a little bit of saliva, and you think I’m cute. You said. It’s a hard fact to deny. You are cute. She said. And you’re beautiful. You said. Rey blushes deeply and gives you another kiss. She was about to give you another when she heard the sound of footsteps. Someone’s here. She said. I don’t hear anyone. You said. Trust me, I know when someone’s coming. She said. Rey knows someone is nearby, but she can’t do anything about it if you’re in harms way. As difficult as it was for her to do so, Rey places you gently behind a fallen engine. Stay there. Whatever happens, don’t come out. She said. Wait. You don’t know who or how many people there are. What if you get hurt? You said. Better me than you. If a fight happens, I won’t have to worry about your safety. She said. And have me worry about yours. You said. Tyne. Please. If something happens to you, I…… don’t know what I’ll do. She said. Rey….. You said. Trust me, I’ll come back. I promise. She said, extending her pinky. I….. I’m holding you to that. You said, grabbing her finger. With a nod, Rey gets up and walks away, staff in hand.

For a few minutes, silence. Then you hear blaster fire. Rey! You said. Rey told you not to leave, but the sound of that blaster shot got you worried. It could have been a warning shot….. But what if it wasn’t….? What if….? You said as your concern rises. You run out from your hiding spot and to see Rey on one knee with a blaster pointed at her. You saw two people. One holding the blaster and another looting Rey’s speeder. From the looks of them, you can tell both are female and human and covered in robes. That’s what you get for blindsiding me. You’re lucky I didn’t shoot you between the eyes. She said. You’re stealing my stuff! Rey said. Like there’s any law against it. Not my fault you left it unguarded. Basically asking for someone to take it. She said. Doesn’t mean you should. You’re interfering with someone’s payday. Rey said. Not like you’re going to miss a thing. I’ve seen how you’ve been raking in credits left and right. You should have plenty lying around. She said. Doesn’t mean I’m going to sit on my butt and wait until it’s all gone. Rey said. Rey reaches for her staff, but is shot in the hand. Still don’t know when you’re beat. How much longer, Camelia? She said. Just a few more trips. Camelia said. Rey was looking for a way to solve this when she saw something moving out the corner of her eye. The lady saw Rey’s eyes darting around. Who’s out there? You’re partner? She said. I work alone. Rey said. The lady puts the pistol to Rey’s head. I know you’re out there. If you want her alive, come out now! She said. Not wasting any time, you step out from your spot and call out to the lady.

W….what? Is that a…..tiny human? She said. Is the sun getting to you? There’s no-whoa. Camelia said. Yeah. Take a picture. You don’t see this every day. We don’t want any trouble. What will it take for this to end nicely? You said. At least one person knows their place. Riza. The lady said. Leave him out of this. This is between you and me. Rey said. Not anymore. What’s this girl worth to you? Riza said. ……A lot. You said. Really? You’d do anything to see her unharmed? She said. Just name what you two want? You said. Straight to the point. I like that. What can we get for a tiny human? Riza said. Wait. Maybe we should keep him. Camelia said. As a slave? Good idea. Riza said. What!? No! There’s no way-Done. You interrupt. No! I’m not letting them take you for their sick games! Rey said. That’s his choice. Not yours. Riza said. You walk up to Riza’s lowered hand and climb up. She lifts you up and eyes you. You are somewhat cute. Maybe I won’t be too mean to you. She said. You’re about to see mean if you don’t put him down! Rey said angerly. He’s ours now. And don’t forget who has a blaster. She said, knocking Rey to the ground. Hey. You got what you wanted. There’s no need for this. You said. You’re right. Let’s go, Camelia. Riza said.

With you in hand, Riza and Camelia get into her speeder, but it didn’t go anywhere. Come on, you piece of junk! Riza said. As Riza was trying to get the speeder working, you and Camelia looked over to see Rey with her arm out. Uh…. Riza. Camelia said. Rey….? Y…..You’re…..! You said, stunned. You’re…..not…..taking him!! Rey said. The speeder then rises. What the!? Riza said. The speeder is pulled apart, causing all three of you to fall out and Rey bring it down right on top of Riza and Camelia. Rey stares at the flaming rubble for a second before she remembers you. TYNE!! Rey said, running to you. Rey sees you lying near the wreck and picks you up, but you don’t move. Rey felt for a pulse, hoping that you weren’t dead. Please..... Be alive. Don't..... Don't leave me. Rey said, tearing up. After a few seconds, she felt your heart beating. Rey breaths in relief and hugs you. She gets to her speeder and takes out all of her remaining salvage so it won’t slow her down. She gets in and drives back to her home.
112211121111111111122212.title: Other scavengers show up

choices: You can't take her word for it
1122111211111111111222121.content:
Argh….. My head. You said, waking up. You get to your feet and see you’re back in Rey’s home. How’d I get back here. Last thing I remember was Rey.... You said. You wonder where she is until you she her sitting at the counter with a worried expression. You get to your feet and walk over to her arm and touch her. Rey whips her head to see you touching her. Tyne! Are you ok? She said. Head feels like it’s been mauled, but I’m fine. You said. Are you sure? I still have some stims. She said. She said. Yeah. Healthy as can be. You said, putting your clothes on. How long was I out for? You said. Only a few hours. She said. And you sat here and waited for me to come to? You said. I couldn’t do anything else. I was too worried about you. She said. Well you can breathe easy now. I’m fine. You said. I see that now, since you’re standing. She said, rubbing your head. While you were happy to see her unharmed, you remember what you saw before blacking out. Rey was using the force. You’ve heard storied about them from your mother, but they weren’t good stories. Manipulative, self-centered, self-righteous, judgmental, and they only care about themselves. Your mother had bad things to say about force users. She told you that if you ever came across one, get away from them. You don’t judge people until you’ve been around them, but you always keep your guard up.

Uh... Rey. I need to…..ask you something. You said. What is it? She said. How’d you…..stop that speeder? You said. I…..I don’t know. I just felt something inside me come out. Something powerful. I didn’t know what, but at that time, I didn’t question it. I wasn’t going to let them take you away. So I reached out, and the speeder stopped dead in its tracks. Next thing I know, I pull it apart like paper. The feeling is still there. In fact, I feel it right now. I don’t know what it is. But it’s powerful. She said. Force sensitive. You said. What? She said. You’re force sensitive. You said. What’s….that mean? She said. It means you can do things with a wave of your hand. Like how you picked up and destroyed that speeder. You said. That’s what that was? She said. …..Hold out your hand and lift up that wrench. You said. Rey holds out her hand and at first the wrench moves around, but it’s lifted into the air. S……so I can do things like this?! She said. A lot more than just lift objects. You said. Rey drops the wrench and saw you looking away and backing up. What wrong? She said concerned. …..I’ve heard…..unsavory things about force users. Now that you’re one of them….. You said. Tyne. After all the time we spent together…. You know me. I’ve never hurt, use, or abuse you, and I never will. I might have the force, but that changes nothing between us. You’re still my little boyfriend. She said. …..How can I be sure? I’ve heard that people change when they get force powers. What if…..you change too? And see me in a different light? You said. With a stern look, Rey walks and picks up a pair of scissors and a blowtorch. She heats it with the torch and lets it cool. What are you doing? You said. With the scissor sterilized, she cuts her finger and a small amount of blood drips out. Rey. What are you…. You said. Rey turns, walks to you, and extends her finger. I take my promises seriously. And it gets no more serious than a blood promise. She said. A….blood promise? You said. I promise that nothing will change between you and me. I won’t hurt you in any way, shape, or form. She said.

You remember all the horrible stories your mother told you about force users. They only care about themselves, kill people just for fun, ignore the plight of others, ect. You never came across one until now. You trust Rey completely. You want to believe what Rey said. She hasn't done anything to earn your distrust of her. She's put you first and protected you since day one and probably will keep that up until time ends. But the words of your mother linger in your head. She's had experience with force users, and she describes them all the same. When she's told you something, she's never wrong about it.


Do you believe in Rey?
1122111211111111111222121.title: Rey's promise

11221112111111111112221211.content:
After all she’s done for you up till now, you trusted Rey with your life. She’s never done anything that you didn’t like or want. Never laid a finger on you. Nursed you back to health. She’s probably the biggest reason you’re alive right now. You look up at Rey’s determined face. .…If she really did want to hurt me or whatever, she’d done it by now. Plus, she’s a direct kind of person. She’d have no reason to play around. You said. You trusted her before, you are certain you can trust her now, so you grab her finger firmly. I…..trust you, Rey. With everything. You said. Rey smiles and lightly pats your head. I mean it, Tyne. Nothing will change. You’ll still be my cute little boyfriend. She said. And you’ll be my titaness, force using girlfriend. You said. Rey goes to dress her cut and comes back.

Now. We need to talk about you not listening to me. She said. Ok. Hear me out first. I was worried when I heard that blaster shot. I had to go and see if you were ok. You said. What were my exact words? She said. Whatever happens, don’t leave this spot. You said. And what did you do? She said. Left the spot. You said. What was going through that head of yours besides making me worry sick about your safety? She said. I had to save you somehow. My only bargaining chip was me. Suffer at the hands of someone else, or Rey lying dead in the desert? A no brainer to me. You said. And what if she shot you? What then? She said. Small target. Was banking on that she’s a poor shot. Come on. You know you’d done the same thing if it was the other way around. You said. If someone shoot at you, I’d bury them up to their heads and practice my swinging and kicking. She said. Can I collect the teeth? You said, making Rey chuckle. See. We both don’t want anything to happen to each other. Why can’t I put my life on the line for you? You said. One: I love you. Two: I want nothing to happen to you. Three: It’s my job to protect you. Four: The size difference. She said. Hey! Size means nothing to me. Normal or small, I’d still risk it for you. You said. And I don’t want that. I care too much about you. If something bad happens to you…. She said. Same with me. If something happened to you, I wouldn’t be able to look myself in the mirror. You said. And neither could I. I don’t want to loss the only person who treats me well and wants to be around me. She said. Rey gently rubs your head. I’m grateful for what you did, but don’t risk your life like that. She said, giving you a pleading look. But…. You said. Please Tyne. You’re special to me. In more ways than one. Just leave the protecting to me. She said. You don’t think you can persuade her this time. She’s insistent on this one. ……Ok. I’ll leave it to you. You said. Rey saw that you were disappointed and quickly explain herself. I know you think I’m being completely unfair to you… But I’m not. I’m just…..looking out for your wellbeing. You understand, right? She said. I know, I know. You and my mother have that in common. You said, smiling up at her. Rey holds up her hand and force lifts you up to her lips and kiss you. Thank you, Tyne. She said, putting you down in her hand.

So. How are you going to use your force powers? You said. That’s easy. To keep you safe and sound. She said. I knew as much. You think those two were important? You said. They were just the regular scavengers. But let’s not talk about them. I want to focus on you. She said. M…me? You said. Rey moves her hand to her chest and holds you there gently. R….Rey? You said. Holding you this close to me…..ease my heart. She said. Hearing the rhythmic beating of her heart made you feel at ease. If I could keep you there, I would. Stop all the heart attacks you give me. She said. What are these heart attacks you have? You said. When you leave my side without telling me or something happens to you, my heart beat so quickly, it feels like it’s about to beat out of my chest. She said. I have that kind of effect on you, huh? You said. Heart attacks are just one effect. She said, rubbing you. And the others? You said with intrigued. I’ll show you later. Right now, let me feed you. I bet you’re starved. She said. A loud rumble come from your stomach. It’s….been a while. You said. Give me a minute. She said. Rey starts gathering some ingredients and starts putting them together. After a 10 minute wait, she’s done. Here. She said. Is that…..peppered bantha steak? You said. Since I’ve been making more credits, I’ve bought some better things for us. I knew food packs will only go so far. She said. Rey cuts a piece of the steak and you eat it. Whoa! This is good. No. Perfect! Didn’t know you could cook. You said. Had to learn. You know I’ve been by myself. She said. Keep this up, and I might have to put a ring on that finger. You said, eating more. Blushing, she sits next to you and eats some herself.

Oh…. I can’t eat anymore. You said. Really? You don’t have room for dessert? She said. That depends on the dessert. You said. Rey bends down and kiss you. She holds the kiss for a few seconds and breaks it. So. How was dessert? She said. Seconds? You said. Giggling, Rey kiss you again before picking you up and placing you down her cleavage. Rest up down there. You’ve been through a lot. She said. And you? You said. I’ll be doing somethings. You just rest yourself. She said. Patting her chest gently, Rey goes about her business while you slept between her breast.
11221112111111111112221211.title: You trust her

112211121111111111122212111.content:
After getting a few hours of sleep, you wake up. You climb up and out to see Rey was rubbing her cheek. Rey? You said. Tyne? Rey said surprised. She picks you up and places you in her hand. You see a bruise on her face. Did….did someone hit you? You said. Y….yeah. It’s nothing. Just a bad sale. It happens every now and then. She said. You ok? You said. It’s not the first time I’ve been hit like this. I’ll be fine, shorty. She said. Ok. What happened? You said. Like I said, a bad deal. Nothing I can’t handle. She said. You’re horrible at lying. What really happen? You said. I told you already. She said. That lie isn’t working. The look on your face says it all. You’d asked none stopped if I had that face. Do I have to be that annoying guy? You said. Rey looks away for a few seconds and turns to you. ……Remember when I said those two weren’t important? She said. Yeah…. You said. I lied. They were. You know there are numerous other scavengers than me, right? She said. You don’t let me see the locals. You said. For good reason. Can’t have someone take you from me. Anyway, those two worked for a dangerous person. I came across him at least once. I know what he was going to do since he lost his two right hands. So I went to confront him. She said. You didn’t…..kill him, did you? You said. No. I left him alive. She said. Wait. How did I sleep through you fighting? You said. I…..didn’t take you with me. She said. What do you mean? She said. I took you out and left you here so I could do this. I didn’t want you hurt or ending up dead. She said. ……Why didn’t you just tell me they were important? You said. Because I know you. You’d do something crazy. Like back at the star destroyer. She said. Can’t help it if I care for you. You said. That’s why I did it. I was hoping to have all my bruises healed before you woke up, so you wouldn’t suspect anything. She said. And you give me a hard time for crazy things…. You said. I know. Now I see why you do them. You want me to know you care about me. She said. Does that mean I can go back to doing crazy things for you? You said. No. My heart wouldn’t be able to handle it. She said. Rey rubs your head gently. I'm sorry for lying to you. Can you forgive me? She said. You know you can't do no wrong by me. Of course I do. You said. Smiling sweetly, Rey kisses you. Thanks for being understanding. It means a lot. She said. Well, you forgave me for all my crazy antics. Only fair I do the same. You said. Such a big heart in a tiny person. She said. Well I can’t be mean to a cute girl. Especially if that girl is my girlfriend. You said. Quit it….. She said, blushing.

So it’s all said and done? You said. Yeah. We won’t have to worry about him. She said. So that just leaves you and me together. You said. I know what you’re thinking, shorty. Let’s save that for tonight. More romantic. She said, smiling seductively. What do we do until then? You said. We’ll just have to wait until then. She said. Rey puts you down onto the counter. Don’t stray too far. Don’t want anything to happen. She said. And you watch you’re stepping and sitting. I’m delicate. You said, landing on soft sand. Delicate, huh? She said. Rey takes off her boot and places her soft foot on you. Rey giggles as she feels you squirm. Should I twist or stomp you, shorty? Since you're delicate, I want to make it painless. She teases. Rey then felt a sensation on her foot that made her giggle then laugh hysterically. You were tickling her foot and she couldn't take it. She fell on her butt as she laugh. Heh heh. You chuckle. No.... No fair.... I'm the only one who gets to do the teasing. She said. Like trust, teasing is a two way street. Good for you, good for me. You said. I guess..... She said, getting up. Well, we’ll see just how delicate you are later tonight. But right now, I need a shower. Got blood and dirt on me and I don’t want to get a disease. Rey walks and sways her hips as she walks, smiling as you look at her tantalizing rear as it shakes. Damn…. She knows how to tease a guy in more ways than one. You said.

While Rey was in the shower, you walk out of the AT-AT, and look out at the outpost as you sit. Never really had time to sort things. Shrunk down to thumb size, far from home, on a desert planet, and into the arms of a caring scavenger who is now my girlfriend. If I do get back to normal, nobody will believe me when I tell them. You said. While enjoying the view, you heard voices. Someone’s close. You said. You hide behind a metal plating and peak out to see two fully armored people next to the head of the AT-AT. You get closer so you can hear the conversation. As you get closer, you see there armor isn’t standard. It’s Mandalorian. M….Mandalorian armor…. That must mean these two are….bounty hunters. If two are here, how many more are there? You said.

She was last seen coming out here. One said. Is it really true, Shanta? We’re hunting a jedi? The other said. From what our client said, she used a staff and the force on our client. But he described her more as a sith. The anger in her eyes was more ferocious than a volcano. Shanta said. Jedi or Sith, I just want the challenge. Credits are just an added bonus. The other said. If we find her, Dal. For all we know, she could be in the outpost. Jedi are good at hiding. Shanta said. Then let’s head back and look. Del said.

Wanting to know how deep this goes, you quickly ran over to one of them and climb onto their boot and hang on as they jet pack back to the outpost.
112211121111111111122212111.title: Later on

1122111211111111111222121111.content:
The two bounty hunters land in the streets of the outpost and start searching. Ok….. Jetpack is off my wishlist. You said. While they searched, you overheard their conversation. Nobody seems to know this girl. It’s like she’s a nobody. Del said. She’s a jedi. They know how to hide. Shanta said. I think we’re asking the wrong people. We need to find someone that knows her personally. Del said. Who’d that be? Nobody here knows her. Shanta said. She must be close to someone. We just have to find them. Del said. Well let’s find them before more competition arrives. Shanta said. Great…. Now they’re after me. But for now, it’s only these two. I need to get back to Rey and warn her. You said. You jump from her boot and quickly run away. Huh? What’s that? Del said, noticing you. What? Shanta said. That. Is… Is that a small human? Del said. Shanta looks at what Del’s pointing at and sees you running. It…is… Hey, you! Stop! Shanta said, running after you. You quickly cut a corner and watch them run by. You peak out and head the long way until you come to the vast desert. It’ll take too long to walk there. Maybe I can hitch onto that speeder. It’ll get me closer, and I can run from there. You said. As you move to the speeder, a hand blocks and closes around you. Damnit! You said. The hand rises and opens, and you see the face of the bounty hunter.

I had to make sure you weren’t a heat induced illusion…. But you’re real. Shanta said. Yeah. Take a picture. It’ll last longer. You said. Del removes her helmet to. So I wasn’t seeing things…. She said, surprised. Looking between the two, they are identical twins. Only thing that’s apart is that Del has black hair, and Shanta has red hair. W….what do you two want with me? You said. We’re looking for someone. A jedi to be specific. Shanta said. What…..she look like? You said. She shows you a holo of Rey. With your size, you must get around easily. Have you seen her? Shanta said. I’ve….seen her a few times. But I don’t know where she lives. You said. I think you do. And you just don’t want to tell us. Shanta said. Why would I lie to two Mandalorian? Especially one who has me in her hand? You said. Maybe you’re a brave one. Let’s see if this helps. She said. She grabs your arm and twists. You bite your tongue so you don’t scream. Not….again. You said, holding it. Now remember? She said. I told you…. I don’t know. I’d tell you if I did. You said. Don’t hurt him. He’s cute. Del said. I’m getting information. 1122311.content: Discarding the dark colored footwear a short distance away, she lowers herself on the ground and positions her feet over your crippled form. Seeing the supple appendages descending toward you close your eyes and recoil what muscles you still have control over bracing for an impact that never comes. Instead, she gingerly places her feet against you - starting first with the ball, then the heel, kissing your mangled form with entirety of the bottoms of her feet. The skin, moist and perspiring from the desert heat stings your exposed flesh, yet she is careful not to exert any pressure onto your hobbled body. After minuets of this(it feels like hours in your mind) she lifts her feet from you. Shifting over onto her shins she leans over, gazing at you intently for any signs of life.
1122311.title: She tortures you with her barefeet.

choices: Rey brakes out of her stupor, and scrambles to rectify the situation.
This is all to much for Rey, she needs this to end...now.
11223111.content: Her chocolate colored eyes roll over your mangled body and begin to piece together a familiar form - a crooked leg, a twisted arm, splintered bones and ragged flesh exposed to the open air. The sight of such gore combined with the realization of her cruelty proves to much for the startled titaness peering down on you as she involuntary voids her stomach...onto you. Waves of off colored, foul smelling bile descend upon you, the fluid seeping into every orifice - over your body, her acids scorching ever nerve ending that has yet to be crushed to pulp. It's flows into your agape mouth, it's bitter taste stifling whatever pathetic moans you can produce. It's goes into your nostrils, you'd be awash with the odor were you not more concerned with the burning in your lungs as you begin to asparate on the desert girls vomit.
11223111.title: She realizes your human.
