112231112.content: You feel yourself lifted up into the air, Rey pulling you from the puddle and laying you out flat onto her nervous sweating fingers making a mad dash for something over on the wall. She tilts her fingers downward trying to get you to roll from her hands but you stick to her flesh. She pulls free one of her hands, your body slumping accordingly and proceeds to pry you off her with your thumb and index finger dropping you, You fall a short distance into cool stagnant water. The pain of impact aside, the fluid is actually quite reliving, washing away salt from your skin and the bile from your lungs. That is until you realizing your descending further into the vessel, and you didn't exactly take a deep breath beforehand. Involuntarily rolling over to your back, your eyes meet briefly with those of the woman, staring back back at you worriedly. As your eyes scan your perimeter you begin to realize just where you are...a toilet.
112231112.title: Rey washes this nightmare away.

1122311121.content: You feel yourself pulled downward suddenly, flushed through the piping you begin to realize this is end, after all you've suffered your going to drown. No sooner then when you begin to accept your fate, you feel yourself deposited somewhere semi-solid and somewhat dry. You gasp for air and are met with nothing less then the foulest odor you've ever encountered. You're eyes dart wildly around the dark, your mind racing to put everything together. Suddenly, it comes to you - your in a septic tank. Her septic tank. The pipes beneath the strangers abode lead to her own private cesspool, the waste coagulating in a semi soft surface. You lay in place for hours, sinking ever so slowly into the mess. Your mouth agape in pain and shame the material eventually enters yours mouth, lying face down you're forced to swallow the sludge just to draw breath. To your dismay the material is too viscous to slide down your throat, you have to chew to choke it down. This assault on your senses continues for hours until your head slips beneath the waste and you are soon after met with blackness. This is how you die, crippled, shamed and disgraced by a stranger, enduring every abuse and indignity only to to be smothered, to drown in the fruits of her bowels.

You keep your gaze on her as you sink further towards the bottom of the bowl and your swear that you could see her lips part and mutter "I'm sorry" before the burning in your lungs cuts out and you're vision turns to black. This is how you die, thousands of miles from home, drowned in a strangers toilet.

11233.title: She takes off her boot, and...

112334.content:
The pain was intense. You couldn’t even scream for how much you were in. And her twisting and grinding did you no favors as you heard a rib crack and cough up blood. At this point, you were just wishing for death. Anything to just make all this stop. Just when you thought your prayers were answered, the foot is lifted off you.

After all that, still alive and kicking? You’re a tough one. She said, with a smile. You just want this all to end. For her to just crush you and be done with it. But that doesn’t happen. Instead, she grabs you with her two tree sized fingers and lifts you up to her huge face. What kind of bug are you that’s so tough? I expected to clean you off like the rest, but you didn't burst. She said. You don't know whether to thank or curse being this durable. Since you're a tough one and all..... Maybe i'll keep you. I could use an insole to ease all the walking. Or as something to take out my stress on. She said with a laugh. You couldn’t speak for the pain, but you grimaced at the thought of being her plaything. Let's get a better look at you. She said. When she brought you closer to her, all the laughter and smiles died away under closer look.

Y….you’re not a bug. You’re…. She said, stunned. You smile as best you can. She covers her mouth in shocked as all the actions she’s done to you hit her. I…. You…. She said, trying to rationalize what she’s done. You cough up blood which snapped her out of her trance. You could see the shock in her eyes, but that was quickly wiped away when you coughed again. She put her boot back on and ran inside her AT-AT.

She pushed somethings off the counter and set you down gently. You groan a bit as she looked over your bloody body. Her finger feels around your body. Disjointed limps, lacerations, bruise …. She said. She felt around your sides and you winced. Broken ribs as well….! She said. She turns around and almost throw up. In his condition, he won’t survive without immediate care. She said. She'd imagine you were screaming your lungs out that you were human. .....I have to help him. She said. She turns to you and grips your arm. Listen to me. She said gently. I need to set your limbs back in place. She said. You look at her as she grabs your left arm with two fingers. Ok….. 1….2….3! *Forces your arm back in place*. ARGH!!!! You said as it was set back. The pain was so intense that you blacked out.

Ok. Now your leg. 1….2….3! *Forces your right leg back in place*. Ok. How’s that? She said. No response from you. No, no, no, no, no! Don’t you dare go into that light! She said. She places her finger on your chest to resuscitate you, but she felt your heart still beating. *Sigh* Just out from pain. She said, calming down.

While you were out, she cleaned out your wounds, wiped up all the blood; Everything she does when she gets hurt. When it was all done, she tore off a piece of clothe and wrapped it around your stomach. She then rummage around the AT-AT until she found a stimpack. She was saving it for in case she was really hurt one day, but you need it more. So she stuck it in your side and injects you. There. Now I just need to wait. She said.

The girl went about her day as usual. She made herself some food, counted the remaining credits she had, prepped for another scavenger run, ect. All the while waiting for you to come to. She was curious about you and how you got like this.

Late at night.

You open your eyes and hold your head. Oh….. Where am I? You moan. You look around to see you’re in a gutted-out AT-AT. And you’re laying down on a counter with a piece of cloth covering you. When you moved, you felt a sharp pain. You wince and grab your side. Ugh…. Feels like a broke a rib. Wait…. You said remembering. The last thing you saw was a huge girl’s face and lots of pain. You got to your feet and see more clothe wrapped around your stomach. D…. Did she do this? You said. You wondered where she was when you heard light snoring. You turn around and she her with her head on her arms and sleeping with a blanket covering her.

That’s her. She was the last thing I saw. She brought me here. And she did this to me. You said. Did she bring you here so she could make you suffer more? You do remember seeing her concern over seeing you. She must have cared if she doctored you. But did she only do it to have her way with you? You’re already small, hurting, and in a place you don’t know. You don’t want to add being a plaything to that list. You trudge to the edge of the counter. Quite the drop, but the sand should cushion my fall. And not that far of a distance to get out. You said. You look at the sleeping girl. She’s out like a light. Won’t know I’m gone until the sun comes up. You said.

Given your condition, you’d make it out of the AT-AT, but the desert is vast. And who knows how long it could take you to reach a town or whoever finds you will be any better? Plus, the coldness and whatever insects that are out there won’t make it any easier. But is that chance better than staying here with her?

11521.content:
https://milnersblog.com/2019/10/04/star-...
https://images.app.goo.gl/wgymfsDtBrUrTX...

(Set before Rise of Skywalker)

Her footprints displaced a wave of strong winds akin to when a star ship lands! Clouds of dust rush past you and your mother as the desert girl takes her closest step to you yet, forcing the two of you to raise you arms in front of your faces in an effort to protect your eyes! The next step overshoots you, as you watch the underside of the girls boot pass overhead; specks of dirt drop from the treads of the boot and land with continuous thuds as torrents of them rain down all around you! The two of you duck in cover and wait for the chaos to cease. With a final colossal boom that once again blasts you with a wave that knocks your mother onto her knees, the girl carries on towards the old wreckage of what looks like a hollowed out AT-AT from the days of the Empire.

You turn to your mother and help her to her feet.

"Are you okay?", you ask as you wipe the dust from her knees.

"Yes,... yes Im fine... Tyn... look, on her hip.", your mother pointed with an unsteady finger up at the distancing giantess and you followed her direction, catching the sight a strange, silver, cylindrical object dangling from its place on her belt. Something about it seemed familiar, obviously your mother recognized it, she couldn't take her eyes off the thing.

"Mom.. I know I've seen one of those before but.. I cant recall. What is it?"

"A light saber. Jedi use them, Tyn. That girl must be a jedi! She can help us get back home to the teleporter!"

"Wait, what? A jedi?", you recalled the memory now. A photo of your father standing next to blonde haired man with the same kind of weapon holstered to his hip. "But nobody's seen a jedi since Luke Skywalker vanished. I think its more than likely that she just stole that."

"Nonetheless, I know our odds if its just up to us to get out of this desert. We need somebody to help us."

You push up at the on the heavy insect as its pincer like jaws try and take a bite out of you, your muscles screaming as it takes everything to keep those jaws out of reach of its goal. If the bug trying to turn you into a meal wasn't enough to could hear the heavy movements of the woman's feet moving about as she seemed to be waiting for something unaware of the struggle happening between her boots. You hadn't a clue what she was up to and you didn't care all that much as you fought for your life. Then you heard a voice, "Do you need some help or not?" Your heart nearly leaped from your chest as strength returned to your arms to keep the bug at bay. She must of seen you, you were going to be ok. She continued with her conversation with the contact she'd apparently come here to speak to. Once more you felt helpless as your arms having used up most of their strength and your adrenaline just about out were about to fail completely. You weren't about to be some bug you'd normally end up scrapping off the bottom of your heel's lunch. You use the last of your strength to push the bug back with one arm freeing the other to reach down to your belt a few tools still hanging off of it. Your fingers grasping for something that might be enough to get you out of this situation. Your eyes lite up as they run over the smooth grip of your plasma cutter. You pull it from your belt and flick it on the short white hot flame only an inch or so long shooting out.

"EAT THIS!" You scream out jamming it into the bugs accepting jaws nearly taking your hand with it. The reaction was immediate and very satisfying, its squirming screams of pain as it attempted to work the burning flame from its maw brought a tear to your eye as it pulled itself off of you and started grinding its face into the mud. You start pulling yourself backwards trying to get some distance as the bug works the plasma torch free finally tossing it aside. The bug was burned a bit with a few holes now gracing its face. If an insect could look pissed off, this thing was fuming.

"Crap." You start looking around for some way to defend yourself as the bug charges at you one more.

Then the ground fell away along with your stomach as you were lifted up by the woman wishing to inspect what the small thing at her feet trying to get away was.

Her dark eyes filled your view as she started to study you, looking over every inch of your inch tall body. "You don't seem to be some kind of droid. Are the empire growing so desperate as to find species this small to do their dirty work now?" You feel the pressure growing as she starts to squeeze the tiny spy she'd found at her feet. "Hold on wait!" Your words seemed to do something as the pressure lessons. "Ready to talk little spy? Who should I send your little body back to when I'm done with you?"

You had already tried running, so now attempting to lie to a woman that could crush you with her fingers didn't seem like the best way to live a long and happy life. So instead you tell her exactly what had happened up to the point where you found yourself right now. She kept quiet, not saying a word simply listening not showing if what you were saying was sinking in or even being taken seriously by her. When you were done things were silent for some time as you watched her thinking over your fate based on your tale.

"So you are telling me, you were part of a team working on a revolutionary technology that would allow for instant transportation to any point the the galaxy and possibly the universe. This technology was still a work in process and you decided to test it and just so happened to not only appear on this particular planet, at this particular time, but at this new particular size." You just slowly nodded your head, "That is the most insane story I have ever heard in my life, I'd have to be some kind of moron to believe it, which is why I trust ever word of it. There is no way any spy would be so dumb as tell such a horrendous tale."

You let out a long and happy sigh, "O thank goddess, thanks for helping me by the way, I was worried I would end up having to find my way back to my lab at my size on my own." A finger came up and pressed into your face hushing you up. "Woah, woah, woah, hold on little guy, I never said I was going to help you. I have my own problems and I don't need to add yours onto them." She then leaned over dropping you back into the mud. "I do hope you figure out your situation though."

You get up trying to keep up with the woman as she started to walk away, but you never stood a chance as you are left in the dust. "No wait please!" You yelled out your voice either unnoticed or simply ignored by her as she prepared to exit the alleyway when two heavily armed storm troops cut off her exit blasters drawn. 1532121.content:
“Would you like to see them again?” Qi’ra asked, a teasing note in her voice, as she slightly lowered you down; her smiling face towering over you as she very obviously implied that she wanted you to say yes.

Slightly flustered you replied, “Yes, of course!” She giggled and lowered you back down to the floor. As you gathered your bearings and stood back up, a shadow loomed over you as Qi’ra’s feet dangled over you. She stretched and wiggled her toes over you, bringing them just out of your reach.

“Like what you see little one?” She teased as she continued showing off. You didn’t even reply, too busy being mesmerized by the long black socks that disappeared into the long flowing black pants she wore. She certainly had a sense of fashion, but that was almost lost on you.

Her feet began to draw even closer before her left foot retreated, and her right foot moved even closer, before gently colliding with you. You were knocked to the ground as her foot hovered over you, only a few inches away. Qi’ra giggled, “Well, I hope you don’t mind a closer look.” She said, before gently lowering her foot…

Everything turned black as Qi’ra’s foot became your entire world as the warm fabric of her sock pinned you to the floor. Faintly from above, you could hear Qi’ra giggling as she began to smother you back and forth underneath the sole of her foot. It was amazingly warm and soft… Not to mention the feeling of being completely dominated… It felt good… You could get used to this.

Qi’ra giggled to herself sliding her foot off of you and moving her feet on either side of you. “You’re so small… And cute…” She teased, “I should keep you forever… As my little pet.” She said, as her soles closed in around you and pinned you between them, and began to gently rub you back and forth between them. It felt like having two heated blankets smothering you on either side.

Eventually, the onslaught of affection stopped as Qi’ra’s feet slid away on either side of you. She was leaning down, smiling over you as she spoke. “How about we play a little game?”

Curiously you replied, “What kind of game?”

“Well, with you being small and all…” She said, gently reaching down and grabbing you. “I was thinking it would be easy to come up with something a little more… Unique.” She said as she held you in her palm just inches away from her seductive face.”

“I uh… Sure.” You said, getting the feeling that whatever game she came up with would be enjoyable for you.

“Well, I was thinking we could play hide and seek or something. It should be a lot harder to find you at that size… Or maybe prison break.” She giggled, “I could… lock you up somewhere… Safe… And you have to try and break out, or I’ll keep you there. Or maybe put you somewhere more secure…” She said, causing your imagination to run wild with possibilities. “Or maybe something else, if you had a better idea…”
1532121.title: Qi'ra toys with you.

"Personally, I think you're too tall. Let's change that." Rance broke away from Jyn Erso and fired his shrink ray at her. Jyn soon shrank and shrank and shrank until she was only 5 inches tall.

"What? What is this? What happened to me? What the hell did you do?" Rance went over and picked up his tiny little doll.

"I shrunk you my darling and now you are going home with me!" Rance placed her into a small canister and placed that onto his belt before heading off to his home. Once Rance went home in his dingy little one room apartment, he pulled out Jyn and plopped her onto his hand.
"I'll take that" He took away Jyn's tiny gun belt and threw it away.

"You are going to put me back to normal size or you will be sorry." Rance picked Jyn up by her coat and lifted her in front of his face.

"I'm sorry Jyn Erso, but now that you are the size of a little doll there is no point in you making any kind of threats to me. My name is Rance Minor and I am now your master and you are my slave little Jyn!"

What happens next?

It is after a grueling mission on Caraxl and the pilot Tallie is relaxing in her private quarters, needing some much needed R&R for her tired feet, sore back, and the stress of flying around in a cramped ship. She draws a bath and disrobes, eager to kick her aching feet up and relax without worries of First Order fighters. Peace and quiet, she mumbles to herself. Her top apparel comes off and she lets her breast hang out freely, the luxury of a private bathroom instead of the shared facilities.

Unknown to her, a small person is climbing up the bath, the view of her giant barefeet hanging off the edge of the tub appear closer and closer. Tallie closes her eyes and her head sinks into a silk pillow she brought into the bathing area. Her giantess legs swing around, and you catch a glimpse of her naked torso as she readjusts herself in the water. Like most pilots, Tallie is fit, a muscular but feminine frame, and generously proportioned upper extremities.
Whoa, you think to yourself, is it worth being squished by a tired, vengeful giant woman for a sneak peek?

info.brief_description: (2020 Update, 7 new characters) A shrinking story set in the Star Wars universe.
info.description:
A long time ago in a galaxy far,
far away...

Star Wars
Giantess Story

Somewhere away from the wars and battles that plague the galaxy
a group of scientist led by Gyana Fenrook were trying develop a
teleportation device. The machine was considered too unstable for
human testing and was seen as a failure. In an attempt to save his
mother’s job her son Tyne Wernim tried to prove that the machine
worked by using it unsupervised. The machine teleported him,
but had a side effect. Tyne was now shrunken to the size of an inch
in an unfamiliar place.




Banned
No invincibility.
No vore survival. (Vore should result in death)
No growing.
No male giants.
(Note: all these rules can be ignored in the "Sandbox", which can be found on the second character select page.)

Allowed
Anything else is allowed.
Humanoid Alien Females.
Every fetish that ties in with GTS is allowed.
I encourage death scenes, but leave a survival option.


WARNING!
Don’t add to chapters that don’t follow the rules above, or your chapters might be removed along with it...


Guidelines (not rules )
Try not to make your chapters too long…
I’ve noticed that creators of other interactives encourage you to write long chapters.
I prefer a short and powerful additions.
I believe that if you make your chapters too long you take away moments where the reader could have made a decision.
Also, a lot of people lose interest when faced with big chunks of text which will make them skip parts and add chapters that don’t hold up with the continuity.

Try to let the story go in all kinds of directions.
The fact that you are a fan of a certain type of interaction should not mean that you only leave choices that lead to that outcome.
Try and leave a crush, vore, cruel, gentle or even scat option every now and then.
It might not be your preference, but others will thank you for it.


Be aware that I might edit your chapters!
In most cases I will simply correct incorrect spelling, improve readability and in some cases rephrase something.


Special thanks to Revan92, Ethin, NightMan, SashaNine, bondtron98, Trolodi, Darkjak45, tpl8, Maxamum and Fredenator for adding the early chapters.


Update log:
(dd/mm/yyyy)
Pre Update 1: Wasn't keeping track of the changes I made yet sorry
(26/12/2016) Update 1: I've added Jyn Erso from the movie Rogue One to the list of giantesses.
(03/01/2017) Update 1.1: I've changed the title page to be more clear and added a new guidline.
(15/06/2017) Update 1.2: I've added Sabine as a giantess after I noticed someone trying to use the rule free zone to add her.
(28/05/2018) Update 1.3: Added Qi'ra from the Solo movie.
(14/08/2020) Update 1.4: Added 6 characters; Rose Tico, Amilyn Holdo, Cara Dune, Shaak Ti, Iden Versio and Shmi Skywalker. I've fixed my misspellings of Qi'ra. Changed "Area without rules" to "Sandbox". And some simple changes here and there to improve your ability to find what you want to see here.
(23/08/2020) Update 1.5: Added Captain Phasma.


Feel free to send me a private message to request new characters.
